I hope this is helpful to someone.

Reviews.Title: Do not purchase from this company
Reviews.Author: S. Nguyen
Reviews.Content: There is NO customer service for this company. I received a COBY television as a present, however, there was an issue with the sound. The sound on the tv did not go very high and therefore I wanted to contact customer service to see if there was an upgrade or something I could do to fix it. I called the number that is listed on their website (877-302-2629) and it is just an automated recording that tells you for customer support, go to the website. I emailed the "technical assistance" and to this day, have STILL not heard back. I sent another email today and doubt I will get a response. I also went onto their Facebook page, which specifically had to state that they do not handle any customer service issues. There is a customer service tab on their FB page that leads to NOTHING. If you read the ALL of the comments on items that have been posted on FB, it is ALL complaints from people about broken products and non existent customer service. It is very disappointing that this company is able to treat customers the way they do.

Reviews.Title: Coby 23'' 1080p used as Monitor
Reviews.Author: Kasia
Reviews.Content: I have to tell you that I got this on black Friday deal for ($78) for use as Monitor as I have my 98" for TV and Movies .. well LOVE IT , I use HDMI cable in place of the analog VGA where the quality is much lower , I calibrated the TV and set down also the SCAN and -11 for sharpens and it is excellent , the view angle is better as my 17" laptop screen , the vertical angle not but anyway I sit in the front of it hanging on a 14" arm straight into my face for best visual effect , I spend some time today to figure the best hdmi setting for PC but finally got the max quality from that , I love the no glare mat screen surface what is very good, no issues with LED back light , I was lucky o get good deal and working correctly device . THis TV use ZORAN technology for the HD as I see the name of the TV as ZORAN and not Coby , I tried to watch some high quality HD fragments and everything was crispy and beautiful , the sound is not the theater quality but that is small TV and I did not expected or cared about as much as I have my 5.1 sound system , however the TV receiver the image and sound via hdmi it can be set apart in your PC setting .. for this price it is GREAT !! and I can't biatching about anything else, a lot of reviews bellow are for the small TV that use different technology and resolution that this one , and even for the $149 it is still a good deal , it is also VERY light unexpected great feature , si I give it 5 stars , for the price, for the next day delivery, for the perfect image performance exactly what I was looking for in a Monitor .P.S I also tried the VGA cable with excellent result on full 1080p resolution even better as the HDMI cable ( surprised ) however the manual said it deliver high range via VGA what was hard to believe after I tried out . The response was much faster and clear .March /29/2013 it still working wonderful as in first day , really glad I got it !

Reviews.Title: Great picture great price
Reviews.Author: M. Wolf
Reviews.Content: This is a great size for a bedroom, kitchen, or small room of any sort.  The picture quality is remarkably good for an "off brand".  I have a Coby LEDTV1926 19-Inch 720p LED HDTV that I bought last year that has been an excellent TV.One word of advice / caution.  My original Coby was near a Vizio and the Vizio remote would control the Coby.  This knowledge came in very handy when trying to program my Direct TV remote to control both this Coby TV and the Direct TV box.  None of the Coby codes work but the Vizio codes did the trick.Great price and pretty darn good picture and sound quality.  Overall very impressed.

Reviews.Title: The TV stopped working just after the warranty ended
Reviews.Author: E. Field
Reviews.Content: The TV stopped turning on after about 3 and a half months of use.  The warranty ends at 3 months.  I did call customer service and they said they would look at it, but didn't promise a free repair.  Since I would have to pay to ship it to them and include a $30 money order for return shipping, it just didn't make sense to do.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy!!!
Reviews.Author: Steve D
Reviews.Content: After convincing my wife's grandfather to purchase this tv because of the great price and decent reviews it had so far it's now dead. Hasn't even been 2 months and it just died while he was watching it. I feel bad for him to have spent that money and have the tv fail. Save yourself and spend alittle more to get a better product as an investment. The price says it all. Cheap is cheap.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy This
Reviews.Author: trshmi
Reviews.Content: We got this TV at the end of November as a Xmas present.  The last day for return was January 31st.  On February 5th the TV stopped working completely and will not turn on at all.  Since we are a few days out of the return policy, no return.  Don't waste your money on this one!

Reviews.Title: Lots of potential, even more issues
Reviews.Author: CollegeStudent
Reviews.Content: I had really hoped this monitor would be great. High hopes, low expectations, and rightfully so.The blacks on this panel are atrocious. The blacklight bleeds on the edges, which is fine, to a certain extent, but noticeable in darker environments. I could live with this.There seems to be a handshake issue between my laptop and the monitor. For the first two days, the monitor worked well. Sound and video were plug and play transplanted onto the monitor. But starting yesterday (this is about three days into ownership), everytime I default video solely to the monitor, it begins to quickly flicker. This does not stop until I select the option where the laptop screen is mirrored on the monitor, instead of the monitor being the primary screen. I'm sure I could find a fix for this. Aggravating? Sure.The TV is marketed as a 1080p set. Which is not a false claim. However, the default resolution is 720p. I didn't know that. Still, it works at 1080p.The reason I'm sending this back is because of the atrocious text reproduction. No matter what I do, the text looks horrible. Super pixelated and choppy. This is unacceptable.On top of that, pictures and videos looked artificial. Colors were not reproduced accurately and at time made it look like I was watching something else when I'd compare the feed to the laptop.Never had a chance to hook up an antenna to use the TV feature.It is thin though. And very easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Awesome!
Reviews.Author: linda roar
Reviews.Content: Fantastic picture, sound, everything!  Love watching my new television!  Hope everyone uses this review to buy it for themselves. Wonderful!!!

Reviews.Title: Coby LEDTV 15"
Reviews.Author: Dr J.
Reviews.Content: May have to return due to faulty sound. Sound stops for no apparent reason. I have tried to remove from power to see if the computer would reset.? I will advise in November when I get back to my Florida residence, which is where the TV is installed. I found out trying to contact Coby that the firm is out of business and no warranty service is available.I appreciate your action on this issue.Dr J.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful TV
Reviews.Author: Dean B. Berkus MD
Reviews.Content: Unable to find a local store that now carries small TV's for tight space installation. This vendor had the right size. The TV works well and satisfies my wife's need to watch TV in the bathroom!

Reviews.Title: Not GOOD
Reviews.Author: trevon
Reviews.Content: This Tv is NOT worth it. I bought this tv and it went dead within a year. I reserched it online and Coby tvs are known to die on you because of the capacitors.

Reviews.Title: Would buy again
Reviews.Author: Adr
Reviews.Content: Great tv/monitor for the price point we are using them for security surveillance system monitoring stations.  Clear, vibrant and dynamic

Reviews.Title: Good backup display or for mobility.
Reviews.Author: Buschchris1
Reviews.Content: For the price at the time this was awsome. I was on a remote island and used it with my Xbox 360 . Good enough to get you by and serve as a computer screen or a T.VIts very light and picture quality is great for the cost. May be good to use to add a screen in your kitchen, bathroom or garage or even a back porch since its small and cheap.

Reviews.Title: Poor sound and picture
Reviews.Author: Larry   Nixon
Reviews.Content: I have purchased at least 6 small screen HD TV's to use in my kitchen and have yet  to find one with  acceptable sound and most of the picture quaility is poor.  This one is no different.  The sound and picture on my iPad is better than this.  The picture quality is washed out.  Surely someone will come up with a usable small screen HD TV like for a kitchen.  In the meantime I'll just keep my old one and once again return this one and wait for an improvement....

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Misery King "cheree"
Reviews.Content: Worked like a dream for about two months then broke just when the warranty expired.  I have other Coby televisions around but this one really let me down.

Reviews.Title: Good price, not so good product.
Reviews.Author: H. Shaver
Reviews.Content: Coby made some very good small screen TVs. The adjustments are very difficult. I cannot get a good clear picture NOT READY FOR PRIME TIME.

Reviews.Title: coby tv
Reviews.Author: James Carlson
Reviews.Content: Is working well and being enjoyed. Was so much easier to shop for it this way. getting out is harder for us old folks.

Reviews.Title: it's okay I guess
Reviews.Author: S. Kelly
Reviews.Content: I purchase it for my mom and it worked for a few months before it stopped comming on....I then plugged it out for 30 minutes then plugged it back in, it started working then stopped again after 2 months, now it's not working. ....save your money and get something else more durable

Reviews.Title: Used as a camcorder monitor
Reviews.Author: Diah in the Doah
Reviews.Content: We use this as a monitor for shooting video at church with a camcorder.  It has performed this task well for the last nearly 3 years.  We connect via the HDMI port and it works great.  Can't comment on the tuner or other functions.

Reviews.Title: A Spare Room Jewel!
Reviews.Author: Swifty
Reviews.Content: For the price and quality performance that we bought this television, I AM THRILLED!! The picture and sound quality is GREAT!

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Tat.s
Reviews.Content: It is a very clear TV. It works nice some assembly is required but it is very simple to put together. It works really nice screen settings may need to be adjusted to your liking.

Reviews.Title: this tv is okay
Reviews.Author: delanoduo@sbcglobal.net
Reviews.Content: the  tv is okay but if you need instructions don't count on them.  they are not in English at all anywhere and the tv came set up in a foreign language.  We were finally able to get through it but I would never buy from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS TV
Reviews.Author: mslalalu
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT FOR MY 5 YEAR OLD WHO WAS VERY HAPPY TO HAVE HIS FIRST FLAT SCREEN... WE GENUINELY LOVE THIS TV!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for kitchen
Reviews.Author: L. Colton
Reviews.Content: Nice picture,perfect size for kitchen. Could have a little better sound quality,you have to turn the volume up quit loud to hear adequitly.

Reviews.Title: great picture quality
Reviews.Author: Mike in Florida
Reviews.Content: this is my 3rd Coby LED TV.  Price and quality are great.  Great TV for spare bedroom or home gym.  No complaints here.

Reviews.Title: TV turns on by itself at all different times
Reviews.Author: FastestMommy ever "Linda"
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these tv's, for kid's bedrooms.  I have had them for over a year and no issues with defects.  The sound is average to crappy, but acceptable for a cheap tv.  The dvd players work well and it's handy that they are included, as the tv's are wall mounted and I don't like cords and things hanging down.My main complaint is one of the tv's turns itself on at all hours overnight.  It's not the timer because there's no pattern as to when it goes off and it's not every day.  This morning, it turned on (volume at 23) and loaded the Mickey Mouse dvd inside it at around 4:30am.  It went off a total of 4 times between then and 7:00am.  The other tv has turned itself on once or twice but this one seems to be possessed.  I swear, it just doesn't want me to get any sleep...

Reviews.Title: great little TV!!!!
Reviews.Author: Ben Humphries "JunkinBen"
Reviews.Content: Still running great after over a year. BUT, the angle of view is a little off unless you can view direct on...  But still a great little item

Reviews.Title: Average TV
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: Good TV for $99.99. Works great, have had it for a year now and no signs of wearing down. Operates just as any TV would and looks good too. Im not here to saying it has amazing quality, but I am satisfied for what I paid for it and just watch regular tv with it and not to view high def blue ray so I wouldn't be able to completely judge this tv.

Reviews.Title: So far, good
Reviews.Author: Robert Ingalls
Reviews.Content: The buttons on the back don't work except the on-off. But I won't return it as long as the remote keeps working. The sound is lousy, but I expected that. I use a remote sound system through the audio jack that is superb. The full 1080i picture is excellent and the dual ATSC and NTSC tuners allow me to interact with my Direct TV receiver and OTA digital HD. I have a Samsung  about the same size and function that cost twice the price. I use it as a computer monitor as well with hook-up through the HDMI slot. So far, works well.

Reviews.Title: ok for my Ma's sewing room
Reviews.Author: Ronald J Davis
Reviews.Content: I bought it for the screen size, price and a replacement for a tv in my mother's workspace. While the picture is great it is slow....whether it be powering up or changing channels. I would choose another tv given the chose.

Reviews.Title: Great for the size!
Reviews.Author: Zeke Thompson
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little TV perfect for having it somewhere other than the living room. The picture looks great and the color really pops out. The only problems I have experienced with this TV is that sometimes the pushing the power button on the back of the TV doesn't work until 5-10 times of pushing it. But its not a big deal.

Reviews.Title: Love itV in the kitchen.
Reviews.Author: Betty Andrade "BA"
Reviews.Content: I have been using it 1st as a comuter monitor/TV then as my kitchen TV. Works well but volume could be louder.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: bry
Reviews.Content: I got it on black Friday last year for $74, and it has worked well in my camper all season.

Reviews.Title: Best Costumer Service Ever
Reviews.Author: Felicia
Reviews.Content: I bought this colby t.v. as a christmas gift for my daughter in december of 2012 and had it shipped directly to her.  For whatever reason, it just stopped working just short of a year.  I wrote to Amazon, and was just expecting some back and forth before anything would be done.  Well, the next time I checked my email, there was an email informing me that a new t.v. was already sent out and should be arriving in about a week.  I was pleasantly surprised.  They made the process of replacing and sending back the old t.v. very pain free.  I will continue to order from Amazon for a long time to come.

Reviews.Title: Good picture, needed external speakers
Reviews.Author: David J. Marsh "TeacherBear2"
Reviews.Content: This is a very versatile unit that can be used as a TV or a monitor for your computer.  The picture is clear and sharp.  However, the sound is AWFUL tinny and puny.  I purchased a set of inexpensive computer speakers and plugged them into the back, and that made all the difference in the world. The unit set up very easily with my satellite dish and the controls are easy.  I had this TV in the kitchen of my old house; I couldn't use it when I moved, so my grand-niece has it now and is thrilled by it.

Reviews.Title: Its decent. Works just fine but
Reviews.Author: Hell
Reviews.Content: Something about the color or contrast doesn't seem right. Not sure what it is. Tinkered with the display settings for a while and didnt seem to please me. Maybe I'm just too picky.Wish there was a USB port for powering my Chrome cast. Wish it had a 2nd HDMI port too.I use it nearly every day so it does its job.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: 20 Words or less
Reviews.Content: Works great for what we needed has great pitcure and was able to pick up lot of channels without antenna.

Reviews.Title: Great price but questionable quality
Reviews.Author: Scott Para
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a gift for a nephew. The price was right but just looking and handling the television you can see this is not the best build quality.

Reviews.Title: Just a tv
Reviews.Author: snowhound
Reviews.Content: Best suited for a kids room. Picture is not as sharp as one would expect an led screen to be nor as bright but what can you expect for a cheap tv.

Reviews.Title: A good deal
Reviews.Author: Douglas Antanaitis
Reviews.Content: I enjoy the picture and the value, I was disappointed in the sound quality and had to add a surround speaker. The connection features located on the have worked out well. A good purchase for a second television.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised
Reviews.Author: Emily Sanders
Reviews.Content: I received this as a gift last Christmas and it is still going strong, so this is at least one person that it didn't die in six months for.

Reviews.Title: Picture angle!
Reviews.Author: rb1947
Reviews.Content: Good picture but you have to watch it straight on or the picture distorts.  Good one for the bedroom but for rooms you move around in, not so much.

Reviews.Title: Good small TV
Reviews.Author: Marlin "mlc"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to have a cheap screen with HDMI input to alow me to check out the functions of some other AV devices. Works great.

Reviews.Title: Attention Required
Reviews.Author: Vanessa
Reviews.Content: The stand was broke when I received this item. I just now realized that I could submit feedback regarding this, I did purchase the warrant as well. Is this covered under it?

Reviews.Title: Good quality TV for Kitchen
Reviews.Author: SHP Trinidad
Reviews.Content: Perfect little TV when all you need is a small additional unit. Stands on its own and has good clear picture quality. Not as suitable for viewing in a large room where the people are in different locations but great for smaller spaces such as a kitchen.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Richard Knox
Reviews.Content: neat Tv - and also has the connections to menu option to switch it to your computer - so you can switch and watch movies off the web - at a cant beat price - works great

Reviews.Title: Good for 6 months...then DEAD IN THE WATER
Reviews.Author: G. Frie "Realist"
Reviews.Content: Actually received this TV through our credit rewards points but like many of the other "1 star ratings" we had it working fine and then it randomly wouldn't show its picture anymore and nothing worked.  It amounted to about 1 year being operational and now it is a decoration collecting dust... Very disappointed!  I have to say it sounds like this TV only had 5 star ratings because the people posted their ratings within 6 months of getting the TV... would be interested to see how many stars everyone that owns this TV would give this TV when it is a year or more into the purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: trucker_jim
Reviews.Content: Well worth the money. Bought for my grand son to play his X-box on so the main TV could be freed up.  This TV has an excellent picture and the volume and sound are great.  Can't believe I got it at that price.

Reviews.Title: WORST TV EVER!!! RANDOM TURNING ON.
Reviews.Author: Jolie Abitz
Reviews.Content: One of the worst purchases ever made.  Audio sucks big time!But the biggest problem is that it randomly turns on.  It can be anytime, day or night.  If it is not used for a while, it is fine, but as soon as you use it, the problem will start.  Turns on anytime, day or night.  We've tried replacing batteries in the remote, hiding the remote, covering up the infrared sensor, etc.  We live on 100 acres, so unless someone is trespassing with a remote control, that is not the issue.  This TV has done this from about the time the warranty expired....go figure!Worst $100 I've spent.  Had I known I would have to unplug the set each time I was done using it (which is difficult because this set is in our kitchen, so I need to go underneath the cabinet, behind the pots and pans to unplug!!!  UGH!  I'd have spent an extra $100 to not deal with this.  Will be selling on CL and buying a different brand TV!

Reviews.Title: Better purchase a sound bar or something!
Reviews.Author: williams nina
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my grandsons and the sound is horrible after one year! I don't know who makes these off brands that seem to pop up every holiday as a great deal but I've learned my lesson, so be warned!

Reviews.Title: not reliable
Reviews.Author: curlyaaron
Reviews.Content: the sound was pretty bad and it stopped working in a very short time... i would not buy this type again

Reviews.Title: What?
Reviews.Author: R. D.
Reviews.Content: Didnt buy it  When do yu show this was purchased by me.  I need to follow up on this, so any information you can furnish will be appreciated.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money on this......
Reviews.Author: Meg Kaufman
Reviews.Content: Horrible TV....definitely don't waste your money on this one.  I bought this not quite a year ago and it stopped working.  We hardly ever used it so there is no excuse why it doesn't work now

Reviews.Title: Great deal for a basic, flat TV
Reviews.Author: David N. Hollas
Reviews.Content: It's a very basic TV.  I bought it to use as a monitor for my security camera system, and needed a smaller, cheaper flat TV for this purpose.  It works great, was easy to connect and set up, and was a good deal for the money.  Plus one star for the cost value.

Reviews.Title: Very nice flat screen HDTV.
Reviews.Author: arnaldo sanchez
Reviews.Content: Very nice flat screen HDTV.  Has all the bells and whistles in a compact 19" screen with a cool remote with sleep timer, hdmi, and svideo, and cable ready.  Very good picture quality with multiple view modes, includes wide screen and zoom, and many other features.  Easily hook up cable tv and PC to this monitor/television. I recommend.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money, barely.
Reviews.Author: Chad Matzen
Reviews.Content: It is cheap fo a reason.  This display has power supply issues and needs to be unplugged occasionally on power up to reset.  Serves it's purpose, but you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful little monitor .......!!!
Reviews.Author: Tony Miller
Reviews.Content: I have us several of these little sets as monitors for my video surveillance business and not one of them has given a problem. The picture quality is great and the video density superior even when compared to more expensive units. Kudos to these little guys as both a TV as well as a superb video monitor.

Reviews.Title: Works well !
Reviews.Author: Leonard Ginsburg
Reviews.Content: The set works very well and gives no trouble. Use of the remote is less than perfect but is certainly OK

Reviews.Title: Coby went out of business--manufacturer's warranty?
Reviews.Author: Vincent C.
Reviews.Content: Coby went out of business in the summer of 2013. If a consumer requires warranty coverage, there is no Coby to turn to since they are no longer in business; the purchaser may need to find an alternate source of warranty coverage.

Reviews.Title: The LED TV I wanted
Reviews.Author: Harold K "live longer"
Reviews.Content: I placed the TV up on a high dresser, so the slant of the mount makes the screen to the bed at the proper angle.It took a while to figure out that the screw to hold the base to the screen is tightened into the base of the screen, so has to be removed from the screen and then reinserted into the base when the base is pushed into the screen hole. Then the screw, which is a wingnut, is screwed through the hole in the base back into the screen. Once threaded in tight, the base is adequate. The slant is purposely made to make the weight of the screen in the center of the wide base instead of near the back end, where it might make the TV tip to the rear and fall.The sound is adequate in the higher tones, so can be heard well in a bedroom.The color and screen size is just what was needed.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: Dar
Reviews.Content: I am really pleased. I recieved this monitor and hooked it to my computer in minuets. However the sound was awful as others have said, bought two small Logitec speakers plugged them into the headphone jack and now I have great sound. Have had no problems and I love the shut down feature, I did buy the Square Trade warranty just in case. Good price as well.

Reviews.Title: DIdn't work at all
Reviews.Author: E. Niven "Metheny Fan"
Reviews.Content: Unit was an "opened box" purchase, and it didn't work at all when I got it, so I sent it back and got a refund fairly painlessly. Since it was a previously open box, it would have made a lot more sense for Dealstop to have plugged it in for 10 seconds rather than waste shipping costs on both ends to send me a dud unit that had to be sent back the next day...

Reviews.Title: ok for baseball or football instead of spongebob.
Reviews.Author: Dennis P Titley
Reviews.Content: ok for a side bedroom thats not used all the time.Picture is not the greatest but okay,sound seems a little on the weak side.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size
Reviews.Author: Troubleshooter
Reviews.Content: The screen is a perfect size. It's on my desk, and I use it for a TV and a second monitor screen. I'm a bit disappointed in the resolution as a monitor - even though I have it set at 1920X1080, it still isn't as sharp as the screen on my laptop set at the same resolution. The size makes that less of an issue, but I expected crystal-clear images (of documents) and it doesn't measure up in that area.

Reviews.Title: Coby 23 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Phyllis Biliack
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying using this TV in my bedroom.  It has a clear bright picture and is just the right size.  The price was the lowest I could find.

Reviews.Title: Could not get it to work
Reviews.Author: Frequent Customer "FCustomer"
Reviews.Content: This may be a good piece of equipment, if you can get it to work.  Itappeared that the unit came without one cable probably HDMI. Thetech support is not available evenings and weekends and when it isavailable the wait is so long that we gave up.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal !!
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: This is our second Coby TV we also have a 40 inch. I think they are the best HD TV on the market for the price.

Reviews.Title: It was a Good TV
Reviews.Author: C. Nickerson
Reviews.Content: It was a good TV but too small for my kids, they were not impressed, but the picture was clear and the sound was great.  Totally great for the price.

Reviews.Title: get what u pay for
Reviews.Author: nathan griffin
Reviews.Content: Alright tv just has terrible sound quality have to turn volume up all the way just to hear it.speakers need to b n front.

Reviews.Title: wonderful picture, good sound
Reviews.Author: KATHERINE ANN ROCK
Reviews.Content: just all-around quality machine"SIXTEEN MORE WORDS REQUIRED" ?  Huh?  What does that mean?  And why?"FOUR MORE WORDS REQUIRED" okay; there they are

Reviews.Title: Great Gift for College
Reviews.Author: C. Nelson "Cinni"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my goddaughter for her college dorm room.  I had it shipped to her.  She took it out of the box and five minutes later, she was watching it.  She loves the size and it has a great picture.  The price is phenomenal and it fits in her room perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Looks good.....
Reviews.Author: Tenni
Reviews.Content: The price was good and the tv seems to be as advertised. Do not expect to get any support from the coby. When you call the recording it says to contact them on their email. When I sent two emails I still haven't heard from them.

Reviews.Title: Great kitchen tv
Reviews.Author: A. P. Carius
Reviews.Content: Has a great picture on all of my cable channels even though I don't have it connected to HD. Didn't want that HD box on my kitchen counter. You have to adjust the sound to get it to your liking.

Reviews.Title: Quality LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Lawless
Reviews.Content: Hottest thing smoking for a little you get a whole lot for this price and quality it is nothing less than the best.

Reviews.Title: 23inch coby tv
Reviews.Author: Diana Peloquin
Reviews.Content: bought this for my son for gaming its just the right size for his room and his ps3 & xbox

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Money!
Reviews.Author: Gammapunk
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to use in my kitchen and it works great.  Picture is awesome and perfect for the area I needed.  Speakers are not greatest, but you don't buy a TV like this one for the sound.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: i havnt gotten it yet but ive used one before
Reviews.Author: Josh Melancon
Reviews.Content: decent tv works well reliable great picture and i only spent 100$ i havnt gotten my current one but thats only cause of some issues with me moving and being in afghanistan.

Reviews.Title: Lasted less than a year!
Reviews.Author: Lish
Reviews.Content: Got this TV on Black Friday 2012. As of today it is dead. Screen will no longer turn on. While the TV worked, it worked great. Picture quality was good, sound could have been less tinny but it was still acceptable. Only comes with a 90 day warranty, buy the extended warranty!

Reviews.Title: PERFECT~~~~!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Brenda Coons-Houser
Reviews.Content: This was perfect size for what i needed, and at a great price. I will be buying more & have recommended it to my friends looking for similar items.

Reviews.Title: It's an okay product!
Reviews.Author: travis palmer
Reviews.Content: It was an okay product while it lasted. I took advantage of using the S-Video, AV, TV, and HDMI for my electronic needs which did well. Plus the sound for the headphone plug is pretty nice. But after having it for 4 weeks sadly the sockets for S-Video, AV, TV, and HDMI no longer works. So it was worth it while it lasted.

Reviews.Title: coby 23inch tv
Reviews.Author: DN1
Reviews.Content: amazon this item was a good transaction this coby ledtv2326 23inch 1080p led httvmonitor works wonberful.....and thd sound is very outstanding  also the color is very sharp....this was a good transaction....thanks

Reviews.Title: My wife still makes fun of me.
Reviews.Author: Joel Lee
Reviews.Content: I bought this on super sale from Amazon for occasional use in our remote cabin, the first one didn't work at all so we returned it.  The new one fizzles out all of the time also and has a bad power chord and the image just randomly fazes out.  It is a constant source of ridicule from my wife because I tried to save a few bucks.  But hey, it was cheap and it mostly works!

Reviews.Title: Convieneit
Reviews.Author: JD0921
Reviews.Content: This small tv has big quality! For the price you can't beat it. It's nice not to have to hook up the digital adapter to this tv and it is very sleek and slim so it fits into multiple small areas. I would reccomend this product.

Reviews.Title: SCAM
Reviews.Author: pedro reyes
Reviews.Content: I was so disappointed, because I ordered a 23 inches and received a 20 inches TV. TO ME THAT WAS A SCAM. NO MORE ORDERS.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected.
Reviews.Author: Mindstorm
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV for my deployment in Afghanistan and have been extremely surprised by its picture quality, its sturdiness and its lightness.

Reviews.Title: Great, a blue TV
Reviews.Author: Danielle McKeag
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on what I thought was a great deal around Thanksgiving. It is now August of the next year and nearly everything is blue on the TV screen. Cannot return and so now I have a bum TV. Awesome. DO NOT BUY!

Reviews.Title: LED TV
Reviews.Author: Ruth McMichael
Reviews.Content: The picture is very clear and beautiful.  I am satisfied with the product and price.  I don't  have anything additional to add.

Reviews.Title: Wish I had read the reviews first
Reviews.Author: GR
Reviews.Content: The sound is terrible. I have used it only two times and the remote is already broken. This is my first time with Coby and it sure will be my last.

Reviews.Title: easy
Reviews.Author: Nell Lamantia "dinosaurlil"
Reviews.Content: fits the bill-needed a reasonable sized tv on a roll around cart to roll to the bedroom or wherever.  Clear picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: Terrible quality
Reviews.Author: Stellasdaughter
Reviews.Content: This is the worse tv i have ever bought, screen turns black after about 30 seconds of me watching it, hdmi and av ports are terrible, sorely dissapointed by this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: A. Beckett
Reviews.Content: I was a little leary of the quality considering the price I paid, but wanted to get my son a flat screen TV for Christmas. It was well packaged and easy to set up. The TV looks and sounds great - perfect size for his bedroom. Very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: NEVER EVER BUY COBY PRODUCTS - Read before thinking about buying anything from this company!!
Reviews.Author: Cathy Hoganson
Reviews.Content: This TV worked for only 3 months, then quit working. All attempts to contact Coby Electronics USA (phone, email, Facebook, Twitter, and snail mail) have failed to get through to anyone in customer service or even just the company. From reading other people's recent reviews and frustrations, it seems that Coby has dropped off the planet (their FB/Twitter posts go through Apr/May 2013... then stop). It is my belief that this company is going or has gone out of business, but I cannot confirm this anywhere.  So, please, don't make any purchases of Coby products.  Buy elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: this doesn't come on.
Reviews.Author: marvin
Reviews.Content: thought i had a great deal but this sucks.. received this tv and honestly am not impressed...i recommend u don't buy it.AND THEY NEVER CALLED OR MESSAGED ME BACK SO SAD..

Reviews.Title: Color ain't quite right
Reviews.Author: Johnny W.
Reviews.Content: I returned this set and exchanged it for a Samsung.  The color could not be adjusted to be "true."  At factory settings it was always a little too purplish.  When you adjusted to try to make it more natural, it just got worse...too red, or too green, or back to factory -- too purple.Also the speakers are at the bottom, facing down which isn't that great, because we put it on a dresser for a bedroom set.  Had to turn it up to like 3/4 volume to hear it in bed.On the plus side - nice clear HD picture.  But as I said, I returned this set for another.

Reviews.Title: Product as promised
Reviews.Author: MSH
Reviews.Content: Great photo, already setup for Digital transmission, excellent picture. Awesome choice for small area, breakfast nook or taking to the deck when nice weather. Perfectly portable thanks to small size and base

Reviews.Title: Broken in 8 months
Reviews.Author: doglover
Reviews.Content: I bought this in December and it is already broken.  Warranty for parts is one year, but labor warranty is only three months; not to mention it costs $30.00 in shipping, per the manufacturer's website, to ship it to them.  It will be cheaper to just buy a brand new television.  Will not buy this brand again.

Reviews.Title: Great....if you like cartoon-like looking people!
Reviews.Author: M. Langenderfer "Tech Geek WannaBe"
Reviews.Content: Loved the compact size, it was for our kitchen remodel. Easy to set up and use...the two bad things are: no matter how we tried to adjust the picture quality, people looked like "cartoon characters", and the audio sounded like it was coming out of a small tin can. I should have heeded the warnings from most of the reviews.

Reviews.Title: sound
Reviews.Author: Dene Molina
Reviews.Content: Picture is good the sound is not the best, but it is for my son and he seems satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: Won't stay on
Reviews.Author: Charles Paris
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughters room for when she comes to visit. It was only turned on ever other weekend for 3 months and now it won't stay. Waste of money, highly pissed about it.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME.
Reviews.Author: Derrick L. Spalding
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a small, light weight, clear TV for a college dorm, small apartment, or some other place a small TV is needed (bathroom?) than this is perfect. I love the TV. Affordable, compact, and great for a college student.

Reviews.Title: Dad Pleaser
Reviews.Author: Donald Taylor
Reviews.Content: What a great way to have a TV and computer monitor all in one. I have been pleased with the ability to switch from computer to football game with realitive ease.

Reviews.Title: Second one purchased
Reviews.Author: Joann L. Allen "Jody"
Reviews.Content: This is the second Coby TV we have purchased. They have great picture and sound quality. The price is right and I am happy to have this in my home.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with it.
Reviews.Author: Thomas S. Werlinich
Reviews.Content: Light weight, plug n play, beautiful color and sharp resolution, I'm very pleased with it and with fulfillment. I'd recommend it.

Reviews.Title: After six months its still a great TV
Reviews.Author: Stephen Paul West "Stephen Paul West"
Reviews.Content: Great price and great image. I like that it has enough connections and ports I can attach my laptop, cable, DVD, gamestate and even a USB key to review pictures. A nice solution for me.

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: JustaCustomer
Reviews.Content: good quality and sleek look. I have it on a wall mount in my daughters room and she really likes it.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working 6months after purchase
Reviews.Author: bcb51
Reviews.Content: Purchased TV/Monitor for a Christmas present December 2012.  Stopped working (will not turn on) in June (six months after I purchased it).  Coby only has a 90 day warranty.  Contacted Coby said I needed to take it to a local TV repair shop and Coby would only cover parts no labor.  Coby did not have any recommendations on TV repair shops in my area.

Reviews.Title: Good pictures but sound quality is not that good
Reviews.Author: Ahmad Helmi Hamzah
Reviews.Content: Ideal size for my kitchen bar. Good quality pictures (maybe because of its size) compared to my 50" plasma. But the audio quality is not that great.

Reviews.Title: It;s just ok.
Reviews.Author: marilyn
Reviews.Content: I had problems with the 1st one and had to replace it, But you get what you pay for , and I didn't pay a lot.

Reviews.Title: I hate it
Reviews.Author: Anthony Onyeka
Reviews.Content: It is not what I sawon theweb. It is too small. I would not pay what I paid for such a smallunit

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: I use this in my office and I love it.  It's fits perfectly in one of the cubbies on my desk.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: SLM
Reviews.Content: Purchased this in late November 2012. It never worked particularly well as a computer monitor - the picture wasn't great and it emitted a constant hum from the speakers and had to be muted with every use. Today, after about eight months of light use, it died on me. Looks like it's too late to return it to Amazon, so I'm stuck with a monitor-shaped paperweight. Trust the other reviews calling this thing a piece of crap - it is. Save yourself the heartache and the money and buy a different model. DO NOT BUY THIS!

Reviews.Title: it's OK
Reviews.Author: stang
Reviews.Content: Picture is OK.....sound is lousy but I knew that because of the other reviews I have read.  Works OK for our laundry room.

Reviews.Title: son loves it
Reviews.Author: tonia schottenbauer
Reviews.Content: bought this for my son and he absoulty loves it. he uses it for video games and watching movies in his room

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: snooks
Reviews.Content: This is a good size for the price.  Picture's clear and sound is great.  I haven't heard a peep from my kids since the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Coby 1526 TV
Reviews.Author: Dez "Dez"
Reviews.Content: I cannot get a remote code for it to work with my Comcast/xfinity set top box.  The 11265 code found on the web turns the tv on and controls the volume.  It dos nothing for changing channels and will not allow me to get "On-Demand programming.  (Comcast did not have a code)

Reviews.Title: Good for most part.  May turn on by itself at times.
Reviews.Author: Todd C. Kingmon
Reviews.Content: The item has the good 1080P HD Picture.  It does turn off or on with difficulty sometimes.  It may turn at weird times like when I was gone for a while.  I guess it detected a sensor somewhere?

Reviews.Title: Great  picture
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: Great value for money for guest room.  Great picture...no complaints so far ..and was easy to set up.  Do not hesitate. Much better than a smaller coby i returned.

Reviews.Title: mine works great
Reviews.Author: John Badillo
Reviews.Content: im handicaped stuck in bed and ive had mine for 2 months and its on all the time and it works just fine. the picture is great and so is the sound .you need to make sure you adjust the picture and the angle of your set and you will be pleased with this tv.i know i am.

Reviews.Title: This TV is what I wanted considering the space I had for it
Reviews.Author: Robert Assels
Reviews.Content: This TV is working perfectly for my. It fits exactly the space I had. The picture and functions are ok. I am very happy.

Reviews.Title: The worse purchase I every made.
Reviews.Author: VIVIAN A. WATTS
Reviews.Content: I brought the TV in November as a christmas gift for my 11 granddaughter. TV only last for 6 months before it went out. I got it on sale for about $77.00 so I didn't get a warrenty because it was under $100.00. I just feel like I gave away my money.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Dudley Tower
Reviews.Content: Good picture quality. Easy set up. Sound quality is not good, but this is to be expected in such a small set.

Reviews.Title: My Coby 19" TFT LED TV (LEDTV1926) stopped working in a little over a year
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv a little over a year ago at Walmart. It worked good until a month ago when it wouldn't turn on. The blue light was on like it had power but no picture or sound. I had it plugged in to a surge protector just like all my other computers, tv's, dvd players, printers etc.. I hooked it up to my DVD player to see if a picture or sound would come on but no luck. I searched the internet to see if any one else was having the same problem and I found a lot of people with the exact same problem. I went to the Coby support website and they had a 90 day labor and 1 year parts warranty for tv's under 40 inches which was no help for me. If you go to the internet and do a google search of (my Coby tv wont turn on) you will see all kinds of people with the same problem. I would not recommend this brand of tv as a result of my experience.

Reviews.Title: Don't expect too much for your money
Reviews.Author: Morgan
Reviews.Content: This is a very thin tv and is functioning as an under cabinet kitchen television for me. The contrast is low, the viewing angle narrow and the unit I received has been previously opened. I'm guessing it was a returned item, as the QC stickers had been cut, tape and screen cover removed and the box was badly damaged. The speakers are very "treble rich" and the av/power cables have to be attached so they stick straight backwards negating the possibility of mounting this to a wall or in my case, rotating the tv up when not in use.

Reviews.Title: Was great until it stopped working after 3 months...
Reviews.Author: Megan Emma Smith
Reviews.Content: Purchased this product for my boyfriend for Christmas. We ended up not setting it up until about March, it is now the first week in June and it won't turn on at all. Tried everything and we got nothing. Very disappointed in this product I would not recommend this to anyone it's seems like a good deal but will cost you more in the end!

Reviews.Title: Coby LED TV
Reviews.Author: gail
Reviews.Content: I gone this TV for my grandson 4 yrs he need a TV so he can watch his DVD on it. It play very good and have a very nice picture on it.

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV!
Reviews.Author: hondais1
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV to replace the old 19" one in my kitchen. It has an awesome picture and works great! Would definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: Won't turn on after only 6 months of use!!
Reviews.Author: hamdan  alghamdi jr
Reviews.Content: Stay away from this TV and better yet stay away from this company. After 6 months of light use the TV is dead  and won't turn on. Called customer service only to be told I need to find a local TV repair shop to see what the problem is.  Only after then will they ship parts to the TV repair service place to get it fixed while I still need to pay for labor which  comes out to more then what I Paid for the TV.Will never be buy anything from Coby again!!!

Reviews.Title: DEAD!!
Reviews.Author: A/C
Reviews.Content: If I could give ZERO stars, I would. After 3 months, this TV just DIED! No picture, no sound...nothing! Stand-by light is on so it is getting power. Electronic Express won't exchange it or give a refund, pawned me off with the number to Coby headquarters. Yeah, right. Apparently nobody works there because I can't get a human on the phone. DO NOT BUY COBY! And never again Electronic Express, they do not stand by their products!

Reviews.Title: great price great picture
Reviews.Author: epaulinman
Reviews.Content: great buy everyone should have one of these . Best Tv i have purchased for the price LED is the way to go and the brand names are to much money

Reviews.Title: Dysfunctional tv
Reviews.Author: 1Skeet1 "Sharp Lips"
Reviews.Content: Purchased Dec 2012. Abt 2 wks ago stopped working. TV screen goes black w/ no audio or video. Wont come on w/remote or back on/off button.  After unplugging and plugging back on, tv comes on briefly then goes back off.

Reviews.Title: 5 star
Reviews.Author: max pepin
Reviews.Content: this tv was awesome!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!I thought coby was a bad brand,but boy was i ever wrong.  I am giving this product  10 stars. Great product.............

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: Andre Miller
Reviews.Content: Not as described.... product was disappointing... I wish I could have seen it in person. I think I should have sent me back...

Reviews.Title: Only lasted 5 months.
Reviews.Author: Brooke
Reviews.Content: After only having it for 5 months the screen went out. It powers on and there is sound, but no picture. This TV is junk, don't buy it.

Reviews.Title: too late
Reviews.Author: ali Nookabadi
Reviews.Content: It was supposed to get the TV on time but I received it too late. the quality of  TV is So So

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: Linda82
Reviews.Content: Bought this in the amazing deals of cyber monday. I have been very impressed with it. Major upgrade from what I used to have. Slim TV that doesn't take up too much space. Clear picture. You won't be disappointed. Great bedroom tv!

Reviews.Title: Happy with this tv
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Dougherty
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up with a great picture, good price and easy to use. I am happy that I bought this model.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for price!
Reviews.Author: H. Saviano "#1 MOM"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for Christmas for my 10year old son's room.  Great picture and sound. Easy to set up too! Over the years have purchased many items from Coby and I have never been unhappy.

Reviews.Title: Just what I expected
Reviews.Author: Rachel
Reviews.Content: It was a great price, I got exactly what I expected. There is a blue light that stays on when off, a little distracting in your bedroom. Overall I am Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: so-so
Reviews.Author: sjmom
Reviews.Content: So I gave it three stars only because it works. Easy to set up. Sounds like someone used an old tape recorder amd is palying it in the next room. The picture is terrible. Looks so pixelated. Ive tried all the adjustments and nothing changes. It works for my purpose as a bedroom tv. I would only reccomend for that only. Not even for a guest room.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Dcon1216
Reviews.Content: Very nice and of good quality I do a lot of research usually before I buy something and this is recommended by me!

Reviews.Title: Sound is horrible
Reviews.Author: Robin Voss
Reviews.Content: I've had a sharp tv in my kitchen for 10 years and decided I wanted a bigger screen. I went with the coby because of the price. I'm sorry I did. The sound is absolutely horrible in comparison to my sharpe. It sounds like its coming out of a tin can. You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: HD tv
Reviews.Author: Bridget bridges
Reviews.Content: Awesome bought for my son's to omit is the perfect size and he loves it just wish that all HD tv's came with a wall mount

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Christie
Reviews.Content: Looks great and a perfect size. I play video games and watch TV on it all the time and it's great if you wanna visit a friend and have a system link up with them.Great for bedrooms and gaming rooms!

Reviews.Title: Great tv for price
Reviews.Author: Lisa LaCoursiere
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sons room. He mounted it up. Mounted well. Works great. For the price it doesn't get any better.

Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: James Blosser
Reviews.Content: We bought this item for my sister who is in a nursing home. We bought it in late March 2013 and today  May 7th it has stopped working. The picture is distorted and nothing I do will fix it. We can return it but will only get a partial refund since it has passed Amazons 30 day limit. Extremely disapointed in this product. Now my sister has no TV and I have to deal with this piece of junk. Avoid , avoid , avoid this product.

Reviews.Title: Using it right now and wow!
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Great picture, i love using it as a monitor. Not to big that it takes up the whole desk. No color distortions, I have not used speakers because I have my own that plug into my laptop. (Just updating this  almost a year later and it is still working like I bought it yesterday. Great product!)

Reviews.Title: It is clear and looks cute
Reviews.Author: Tan Nguyen
Reviews.Content: I bought it during holiday season last year w. good price and it is clear picture. I recommend you to buy it.

Reviews.Title: Very Poor TV
Reviews.Author: Christie "bstaley"
Reviews.Content: I am absolutely disgusted by how poor this tv was, I originally bought this for my 7 year old daughters room. After hearing the sound quality it immediatly left her room and became my computer monitor for 5 months, and now it wont even turn on! DO NOT BUY THIS TV!!!! I really hope Amazon stops selling this product to the poor people who think its a good deal.

Reviews.Title: screen of death
Reviews.Author: Noah E Kuester
Reviews.Content: I bought this from the warehouse with a minor defect... or so I thought then I hooked it up to the computer with worked for 15 minutes until the screen went snowy and spooky 'Silent Hill' static took over.then I hooked it up to the dvd player only to find the same thing happen again.I have burned some money before but never like this.

Reviews.Title: great quality
Reviews.Author: Debbie Colwill
Reviews.Content: we needed a monitor for our security system.  so this hangs on the wall so we can see everything going on in our parking lot.  good quality picture.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Guest Room
Reviews.Author: Ceeanne Nitlof "Ceeanne"
Reviews.Content: My guest room is small, so a big flat screen just wouldn't work.  This is just the right size, great picture & sound.

Reviews.Title: speakers are too small
Reviews.Author: Rog
Reviews.Content: Speaker volume is too low. Picture is ok though. It is possible one of the tiny speakers is not functioning at all.

Reviews.Title: Received Mar 11 failed 24 April
Reviews.Author: Rich J
Reviews.Content: Received it promptly, worked well for 1 month, 13 days. Video blinks on and off, slow strobe effect. Called Coby @877-302-2629 (thought I would save you some time) and received an email within 2 minutes stating:Instructions for a TV repair:1.  Make a copy of your proof of purchase/receipt. Do not send originals.2.  Write on the copy in detail, the problem you are having with your unit.3.  Make sure to include your name, phone number, and address you would like unit shipped to.4.  Please include a money order to cover the return shipping charge of $ __25___.5.  Place all the above in a box along with your unit and send to:Coby Returns/TV150 Knowlton WaySavannah GA 31407I asked about turn around time, was told by Robert 4 to 6 weeks.I have a Vizio that has been knocked off the table 3 times and it is still going 3 1/2 years later.Save your money, buy something better.I bought the extended warranty expecting to use in 2 to 2 1/2 years. Not sure it will survive long enough to get to an extended warranty.Buy this at your own peril.

Reviews.Title: This is a great value, but the settings out of the box need adjusting
Reviews.Author: aakfl "aak"
Reviews.Content: Coby manufactures TVs for many brands, including Samsung. The 2326 is a budget set that works great. The picture out of the box is set much to bright, causing poor black level, and washed out colors. Once I adjusted that down to my liking, the picture was terrific. The sound out of the box was set to "mono", and the high treble and low bass made the TV sound scratchy. Changing to surround and playing with the treble and bass controls a little resulted in a very acceptable sound performance. All ini all, I'm very pleased. I use this set in my gym, when I'm on my treadmill.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: M. David "emsgirl"
Reviews.Content: I've had this tv for several months, I just love it. I wanted a smaller tv or the kitchen...this fits the job! Great screen quality, very nice tv!

Reviews.Title: Okay TV for price, but not a great picture and just satisfied beacuse I don't use it that much!
Reviews.Author: Thomas Tyree
Reviews.Content: Not a bad tv, but picture not that great and must view from straight on or the picture goes very dark. If I buy again, I would get a brand name product that I know I can count on. For the money it's okay and for use in the kitchen while cooking, I can deal with it. Don't buy it if you expect to be watching it alot because you will be dissappointed!Spend a little more and watch for sales and I think you will be happier. The only good thing was that it is cable ready and very easy to install in about 5 minutes!Thanks, Thomas

Reviews.Title: Bought for a Christmas present and it broke in the first month. I would not recommend to anyone. do not buy.
Reviews.Author: Tom Crouch
Reviews.Content: bought for a Christmas present and it broke in the first month. I would not recommend to anyone. do not buy.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Mike "Mike"
Reviews.Content: For such an inexpensive TV the TV sure does have a great picture.  My cable is not the best, but the set does a good job pulling in the signals.  The cable has NTSC, ASTC, and QAMM, and the set has no problem with the channels that have decent signal strength.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Ralph
Reviews.Content: For a small TV to be used in the Kitchen it's OK value for money. Easy to set up & operate.

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom television!
Reviews.Author: Linell Schroeder
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my bedroom and am so pleased. It is just the right size and has a wondefully clear picture.Great Value for the money!

Reviews.Title: Kinda - Sorta
Reviews.Author: charles hatchette
Reviews.Content: Color is suspect. Sound is intolerable. Howver, not bad for a kitchen, "sometime" tv. Would not go with this brand again.

Reviews.Title: Bought this for an elderly friend..
Reviews.Author: Charley "Charley"
Reviews.Content: He wanted a new TV and I helped him get one cheaper than in WalMart.  He just loves it.  The sound and picture is wonderful.  Not a bad price either.  He's had it now for a while and I asked him about it only once but he tells me everytime he sees me that it's still doing the job!  And he would tell me if it was messing up for sure.

Reviews.Title: INFERIOR  PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Courtney Blissett
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A REAL INFERIOR PRODUCT WHICH SHOULD BE PULLED FROM THE MARKET , I BOUGHT ONE IN DECEMBERAND ITS OF NO USE RIGHT NOW , IT JUST WENT LIKE THAT , ALSO I THINK THE DEALERS ARE UNFAIR , I SPENT $129  AND SOME CENTS AND ITS ALL DOWN THE DRAIN NOW WHICH IS REALLY REGRETABLE.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this product!!
Reviews.Author: Grant Richards
Reviews.Content: I bought this product for my son as a Christmas present on December 17, 2012 and on April 1, 2013 after just three months of use it quit working.  This product carries only a 90 day service and parts warranty...I guess for good reason.  Coby was not willing to work with me at all.  So, if you decide to buy this product, I hope your chances that you make it longer than three or four months is better than my experience.  Very unhappy customer!!!!

Reviews.Title: Customer service does not respond.  The instruction manual and all settings are in Spanish!
Reviews.Author: Judi Houff
Reviews.Content: I was able to hook up the tv, but everything is set for Spanish!  I emailed their customer service and they have never responded.  The picture is good and it is a nice tv, but I am not satisfied with their customer service.  Why in the world would they ship a Spanish set up tv to someone?

Reviews.Title: NOT BAD
Reviews.Author: TALL MAN
Reviews.Content: GOT THIS FOR THE KITCHEN COUNTER. THE COLOR IS GOOD, HAS ALL THE NORMAL BELLS & WHISTLES. I DO LIKE THAT IF U PUSH A CHANNEL ON THE REMOTE IT TAKES U TO THE HIGH DEF CHANNEL VS THE STANDARD CHANNEL.  THE ONLY DIFFERENCE IS ITS ALITTLE SLOW GOING BETWEEN CHANNELS IT DOSENT SLAM IN THE NEXT CHANNEL LIKE MY SONY OR SAMSUNG BIG TV.  BUT FOR $100 IT DOES WHAT I EXPECT.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for!!!
Reviews.Author: JOYJOY
Reviews.Content: Very flimsy and the picture is not very good.  Just needed for a second bedroom, so, it is adequate, but I am very disappointed in the quality.

Reviews.Title: Coby one of the few companies that still sell a 15 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: True story!My son got into trouble and is in a program that will only allow him and anyone else in the program to have a HDTV.  However I spent hours online and in stores trying to find one.  I then by pure accident found Coby's 15-inch 720p  60Hz  HDTV.  i never heard of the brand and honestly didn't expect any options.  However to my great amazement the unit had alll the options I needed and more.  When I opened the box and pulled it out I immediately knew i made a good choice.  I am extremely pleased as is my son with the product.  As a matter of fact he has told the other that are also restricted to getting a 15 inch unite about our experience and I suspect they will be looking to buy the same unit.

Reviews.Title: bad tv
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this tv.  Stopped working after an hour or two of use.  Could not send it back from the retailer I bought from (not amazon).  I would recommend stay away from this brand and go with another cheap brand, or spend extra for the vizio/rca/samsung type products.

Reviews.Title: Product Sucked!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jackson
Reviews.Content: I received this TV on March 6 and the TV broke down on April 16. Be aware of this product as they break down and it's almost impossible to get a refund past 30 days. Now I have to buy a new TV and I just wasted $150 dollars.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv
Reviews.Author: Shari Riley
Reviews.Content: bought this TV on black Friday for $78 and it has a great picture, sound and with the bracket on the wall, my company loves it. Wish I could have bought more, would have used them for xmas presents

Reviews.Title: LED TV
Reviews.Author: Piotr Bugiel
Reviews.Content: VERY NICE LED TV FOR GREAT PRICE ,CRYSTAL PICTURE ,ULTRA THIN ,EXELLENT FIT FOR THE WALL ,LIGHT AND BRIGHT  THANK YOU

Reviews.Title: Poor sound , and cannot use Optimum remote.

Reviews.Content: I cannot use my Optimum remote, as there is not a code on the Coby to use.Also the sound quality is very poor. We purchased this to replace a 20 year old Panasonic TV, it was funchioning fine, but had hoped for a little better sound quality, but not the case

Reviews.Title: A great anthropomorphic tv
Reviews.Author: theringco "Theringco"
Reviews.Content: We have this flat tv mounted behind a twoway mirror in a frame so my wife can watch tv while getting ready.It is out of sight when not powered on.

Reviews.Title: decepccionado
Reviews.Author: luis herrera
Reviews.Content: soy de venezuela, el tv llego con un defecto cuando se enciende al poco tiempo se apaga necesito que me den una respuesta a esto...

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the Money
Reviews.Author: Thomas N. Gilmore
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV for a spare bedroom. I highly recommend it for a lower price than what I now see posted ($119.00). It does have really cheap sound if you only depend on the internal speakers. Fortunately it has the headphone jack that can used to hook up a small set of powered speakers which I did and it really makes a big difference. The picture on the TV is really quite good.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my kitchen
Reviews.Author: Annette L. Kuttnauer
Reviews.Content: Flat...takes little space...picture clear...took a couple hours to install with Comcast as my server finding the correct numbers for their digital outlet. Not the TV's fautl.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Georgianna Hoffman "georgie"
Reviews.Content: tv great use i watch tv every day i got no proublems with this at all glad i order this tv

Reviews.Title: Bought as a present
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Cordell "Mother and Wife"
Reviews.Content: Paid a good price, but the picture is absolutely horrible!! You can't read anything on the screen and the picture itself is just fuzzy. I have tried adjusting it to no avail. I guess, you get what you pay for. Would not buy again!

Reviews.Title: I'd recommend it to everyone.
Reviews.Author: Gabby4864
Reviews.Content: It has a wonderful picture without Cable.You add cable and it's a remarkable TV. If you use it in the Childrens room , you will have to mount it. It is very light weight..

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: afarnie
Reviews.Content: Great quality sound and picture, perfect for small dorm room. Perfect pairing with DVD VCR player, nice small system. Great

Reviews.Title: There was an oops, but it worked out fine.
Reviews.Author: Lady of the Lake "Lady of the Lake"
Reviews.Content: I am finally enjoying my purchase.  The item came as tho it had been prepared for a customer in Mexico.??  Defaults were set in Spanish and only Spanish language owner/operator manual was sent.  But after a call to the Coby folks, they sent me a manual in English.  It cost me some time, but I had already figured out how to resent the menu, etc. into English.  Thankx Coby for your quick response to my plea.  Product will be enjoyed as a tv for the office and as a computer monitor.

Reviews.Title: Broke after 3.5 months
Reviews.Author: Sarah Walker
Reviews.Content: Broke at about three and a half months.  It was a gift and I feel bad that they only got to use it for a short while for the money.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Gilbert Simmons
Reviews.Content: For our kitchen It works great. Audio is a little low in quality, but it is still worth every cent! I would recommend this!

Reviews.Title: a great tv
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing TV for a great price. It's simple to use but has a great quality and it works very well. I does well with gaming, movies and regular television. Best HD TV I've seen for a very affordable price. Love it.

Reviews.Title: TV was as expected
Reviews.Author: Brady Rusch
Reviews.Content: I wanted a TV that would do the job and this one does. It looks good, like it's a new tv. The seller mentioned something about cosmetic blemish, but I don't know what they were talking about. It looks perfectly fine to me.

Reviews.Title: piece of garbage
Reviews.Author: Barbara Copley
Reviews.Content: Six months after I bought this TV it stopped working. Just stopped. I contacted Coby, and they said I needed to take it to a local repair shop and have the repair shop contact them. The repair shop identified the problem (blown mother board) and then Coby said they no longer had the part. They told me to ship the TV to them and they would send me back a new one. ELEVEN WEEKS LATER, after a series of emails back and forth, I finally called and spoke to someone who promised me I would receive my TV. I did, but IT WAS BROKEN. I called Coby and asked for my money back. They said it is not their policy to issue refunds. So I had to return the second TV, too, and now am awaiting another replacement. LOUSY PRODUCT. LOUSY CUSTOMER SERVICE. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!

Reviews.Title: Coby  TV
Reviews.Author: ann
Reviews.Content: This is a good little inexpensive TV for a kitchen or bedroom.  It does not have the best picture quality when viewing from the side.  Sometimes it cuts off without warning.  It's only okay.  I would not buy it again.

Reviews.Title: picture gone
Reviews.Author: Terri Lipman
Reviews.Content: I have owned this for less than a year and the picture keeps disappearing.  Once before it went away.  it came back but now seems to be gone for good.  It is only on for an hour or two each day.  Can't be burn out already?Piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: My 4th month
Reviews.Author: Dustin Hubert
Reviews.Content: Had the tv for 4 months it is still going strong I only bought it to last through my deployment and it is a great TV as of now so I can't complain!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: StephM
Reviews.Content: For the price you can't beat it! Would definitely recommend this product to others! It is definitely worth checking out!

Reviews.Title: got this on a special
Reviews.Author: Mike A Ciccocioppo
Reviews.Content: Great TV for $180! would have given 5 stars but remote was terrible and needed to be pointed just right, and then just stopped working after a couple months.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: angie
Reviews.Content: t.v works great it was a decent price and i got it really fast it was used i believe but there were no scrathes or anything the remote works great and even came with brand new batteries id deffinetly get this again in the future.

Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bad! Had the tv for 40 days and then it just quits working for no reason! Never moved it or anything. The screen just does not come on anymore!!!

Reviews.Title: Good little TV
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey S Hansen
Reviews.Content: After a couple weeks, the TV performs well.  I added external desk PC speakers to enhance sound since most TVs of this style/size do not produce good sound. Be prepared to spend an extra $25 for the speakers at your local big box but it made a big difference.

Reviews.Title: coby ledtv
Reviews.Author: L. Rodriguez "never judge a book by it's cover"
Reviews.Content: I love it.  I bought to replace my smaller tv I gave to my neice.  I have this one in my work out room.  Keeps me moving and burning calories.

Reviews.Title: 19" for small bedroom
Reviews.Author: lburton817
Reviews.Content: Perfect little Tv for small bedroom. Picture is great. Love that it's led! Great sound. Easy set up. I'd buy another if I needed one'

Reviews.Title: Defective TV
Reviews.Author: dw
Reviews.Content: I purchased the TV for my 81 year old dad as a Christmas gift. He is technologically challenged, so he left it in the box until I arrived to visit last week. I opened the box and connected the TV. Immediately I noticed the color/tint was intermittently fading in the picture. Poor quality picture. Once the TV was on for a period of about an hour, the TV began to show lines, rectangles and other crazy flashes and was impossible to watch. I contacted AMAZON and they basically told me that because it was over a month since I had purchased it they couldn't do anything. They referred me to the manufacturer.I called Coby and spoke with a gentleman (Paul) who stated that I was in luck since there is a 3 month guarantee on the TV from them. I will ship the TV back tomorrow (at my expense + an additional charge of $20-$30 for service fees). I am not sure I even want another one of these TV's, but for $40 bucks I figure I will give them one chance to show me it was just an isolated incident.Lessons learned here: When you are buying a low cost electronic item from AMAZON, make sure you (or someone else) can open it immediately and test it to make sure it isn't a lemon. So far I have to admit the customer service at Coby was very satisfactory. The rest of the story remains to be seen. If I get the TV or another one back and it doesn't work, I will post again.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV
Reviews.Author: Matthew Millsap
Reviews.Content: TV works great have one in both of my kids room. Great sound and color couldn't be happier with the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Fay
Reviews.Content: i couldn't of got a better tv for what im doing with it the sound and picture is great !!!!!!

Reviews.Title: tv is ok
Reviews.Author: Donald
Reviews.Content: The tv is ok it doesn't get the best reception with rabbit ears but the price is good. Now I need a better antenna.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV!
Reviews.Author: Nichole Mathison
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son's room. The color is fantastic. I would highly recommend this TV, great deal for the price!

Reviews.Title: 1st set replaced, 2nd set lasted 3 months - 1 month beyond replacement period
Reviews.Author: jan
Reviews.Content: Do not waste your time buying the product.  Any amount spent will be a lose.  Screen goes white - set is gone.

Reviews.Title: Simple and Nice
Reviews.Author: Guy Yankovich
Reviews.Content: Easy to you and very nice and good quality picture.  Lots of inputs. Simple to use, and set up. I would buy another

Reviews.Title: Coby is the brand!
Reviews.Author: Kesron
Reviews.Content: what can i say about Coby? it is my first time owning a coby LED tv and it is very fantastico

Reviews.Title: Nice Picture for the money.
Reviews.Author: MoodyWitch
Reviews.Content: This tv just seems to take a long time for the picture to come on and the volume seems a bit off I had to mess around with it awhile before I got the volume to sound o.k. But it does have a nice picture and it fits nice on my little shelf in my computer desk hutch...

Reviews.Title: Video is good, but the sound is terrible
Reviews.Author: Earl
Reviews.Content: I put this downstairs in the basement to work out with and noticed the picture is really good, but the sound is really, really bad.  I am looking to get a speaker system for the tv, but still, you should have to buy one.....

Reviews.Title: kitchen counter tv
Reviews.Author: Mary Lou Burger
Reviews.Content: Size and price great. Sound tinny but ok small space. Picture good.  Easy to install.  Coby 15 inch fit my needs.  Delivery quick and free.

Reviews.Title: Works for me!
Reviews.Author: Earl F. Gilbert
Reviews.Content: I purchased some plug-in retro video games, so I needed something to play them on (without having to fool with our regular tv hook-ups)  I found this set to be easy to use as a monitor and have had no problems with it.  It may not be sophisticated enough for some electronic fanatics, but my needs are simple.  So, I'm satisfied.

Reviews.Title: If I can give zero rating I woulde prefer that
Reviews.Author: Bineesh
Reviews.Content: Please don't buy this product .1. The TV was not starting up after 3 months . I have purchased during black friday deal and hardly used the TV as I don't have cable connection . All of a sudden TV started behaving wired , as when we switch on the power the TV won't get on and sometimes works . During this 3 months I have hardly used the TV for say 64 hours as I don't have cable connection and don't use the TV to watch online movies . But after using the TV for 2 days it's started giving the trouble of 'power on' issue . I have returned the item2. Other thing is the picture clarity . You can see different colours on monitor and not good .Please don't buy this product thinking it's cheap . It's waste of money .

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my kitchen,I loved it so much I ordered another one for my office. Picture and sound is clear, and it's a perfect size for smaller areas, especially if your not looking for a wall mounted TV. The price was right too. Amazon shipped this out to me in less than a week and I had it up and running in minutes.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for a Small Apartment

Reviews.Content: Picture quality is great.  The only flaw I can see is that the sound quality is pretty poor.  I see others have the same concern, and added speakers, which I might do.  But other than that, I am very pleased with the tv!

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: we mounted this TV undercounter and it has a great picture and is the perfect size of our space. good buy

Reviews.Title: So far, so good. Just a minor complaint.
Reviews.Author: James Webb
Reviews.Content: I just installed this television but I have one complaint as of so far. The plate for the serial number is in the same place you would attach a wall mount. It seems like a dumb place to put it. Or maybe I'm just dumb for hanging it on the wall before I registered it. I ended up having to take the television back down to register it and then put it back up.The sound is a bit iffy. For a small, inexpensive television, it's okay. But don't expect the sound to wow you.

Reviews.Title: i hate it. Waste of my Money.
Reviews.Author: yleana garrido
Reviews.Content: this was my dad's gift for christmas and it has being a total mess. when the TV was received in the dominican republic it was completely fine, it was connected and installed, then from a moment to the other the TV started to heat up in the back and to burn the cables for the audio.  the TV was taken to repair and now the audio boards is not working.  A BRAND NEW TV???????????? waste of my money.  I would never buy a COBY again.

Reviews.Title: Go to Bed with it ever night
Reviews.Author: TY "Frank Carter"
Reviews.Content: Nice timmer and picture. The best thing is it hardly uses any power to run. It's a small picture but for the bed side it's plenty large enough

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: papajamie8
Reviews.Content: Its exactly what was described. me and my wife just wanted a tv to watch news, so nothing crazy big. whent from a 19" to this 23". Wow, very clear picture, lots of inputs for my speakers and dvd players.

Reviews.Title: why i brought this item
Reviews.Author: peggy sykes
Reviews.Content: my grandson  will enjoy his new tv that he got from amazon  for get the honor rolls in school.  and it the right size forhis room

Reviews.Title: Perfect fit for my need!
Reviews.Author: G. Stewart
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv to place in the bathroom.  It replaces another one that I had that was smaller and also did not provide closed captioning.  I need the cc due to a hearing disability.  The tv looks great, has a nice picture, and true colors.

Reviews.Title: hdmi input broke
Reviews.Author: litchen
Reviews.Content: after about 5 months the 1 hdmi input it had doesn't work.its not the playstation 3 because hdmi cord still works fine with my projectorWASTE OF MONEY

Reviews.Title: Purrrfect!!!
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: Even better than I antisipated...awesome picture! Excellent BUY for the price!!! Needed for my kitchen, all my friends want one too seeing what a great picture all while being busy in the kitchen, you on't miss a thing!!

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk.
Reviews.Author: beckandjus
Reviews.Content: Found this on Amazon during the Christmas rush and bought it for $78. Have had trouble with it off and on ever since, and here it is, February 15th, and the screen flashed and the power went off. It apparently blew, and will not power on. Total piece of junk. Not even worth the $78 I paid for it on sale. Now we have to find my son another TV, and I cannot return this one because my window to return it ended on 1/31. I will never buy Coby again.

Reviews.Title: Pretty nice
Reviews.Author: strevino69
Reviews.Content: For an inexpensive product, i thought this tv was a pretty good. it has a nice picture and good sound. Perfect for my bedroom and the extra xbox.

Reviews.Title: COBY HDTY
Reviews.Author: rita ward
Reviews.Content: I THINK THE PICTURE LOOKS REALLY GOOD, HAPPY WIT IT AND THE PRICE WAS REASONABLE.  NICE FIT FOR MAYBE GARAGE OR KITCHEN

Reviews.Title: quality!!!
Reviews.Author: wangyi
Reviews.Content: i brought this TV 13 days ago, but the quality is terrible; everytime i play xbox with this TV that always 'no signal' or 'detecting'. I CAN NOT STAND IT ANY MORE!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for price
Reviews.Author: janice
Reviews.Content: It is a great TV for the price. It has a nice picture and also great sound. It is just as described

Reviews.Title: TV for bedroom
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Wonderful purchase.  Good price.No warranty info in box.  Hmmm, wonder about that.maybe someone could contact me about this.

Reviews.Title: One of my best buys ever
Reviews.Author: fran
Reviews.Content: I got this as a lightning deal and it is amazing. I would not have been able to afford otherwise, but it was so easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: junk tv
Reviews.Author: adolfo aviles
Reviews.Content: Wish I had looked at the bad reviews on this company because now I have a tv that didn't even work on day 1. The screen goes black after about 10 minutes of playing live TV. I keep having to turn the TV on and off just to see a 30 min show. Im going to pawn this tv or something. Im sure i'll be out most of my cash but it's better then having a tv that does not work.

Reviews.Title: Short lifespan
Reviews.Author: Carmen Askew
Reviews.Content: This was a good deal at the time, with good picture that served well as a TV in the kids bedroom. Had it for just under a year before it simply just stopped working; powered up and then powered off never to be turned back on again. I took it to a repair shop hoping it was a quick and inexpensive fix....wrong! Was less to replace it. I found the same brand but with more features on sale.
