I'm hoping that because the replacement TV seems to be a step up and was originally much more expensive that it will have a longer life.

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV
Reviews.Author: Tucson Kid
Reviews.Content: After extensive research, I bought this TV for a Christmas present. I needed a small TV for the kitchen area. The size of this TV was perfect. Volume, view ability and ease of use is just what was needed to provide access to news and sports while doing the kitchen chores. This is what we needed. I could not be any happier.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: Jhonatan
Reviews.Content: excelente producto, de alta calidad, original, entregado a tiempo, lo recomiendo ampliamente a todos los lectores y espero que mi opinión les sea útil.

Reviews.Title: Turns on by itself???
Reviews.Author: Steven B. Lamb
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for our bedroom.  I don't think there is a product flaw as it does not happen at night but during the day sometimes the TV just turns on by itself while we are in the livingroom(watching TV).  I believe that the remote is just on the same frequency as another device but it can be annoying.  I like the quality for price.  It's just what we needed for our room.

Reviews.Title: Works great for viewing instructional DVD's
Reviews.Author: Bonnie "BJS"
Reviews.Content: I use this to watch educational DVD's. I don't have it attached to Cable or any other TV source, nor the internet. What I can tell you is hooked up to my DVD player with an HDMI connector the picture is very clear. The sound is decent for a small room. (10 X 12) There are only 4 people using the TV so it's plenty big enough for my needs. I don't know how good it would be for Cable or broadcast TV but for my needs it's fine.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Mom
Reviews.Content: Bought this 2 years ago for a Christmas present and it has been great.  It is used everyday for most of the day and picture is still just like it came out of the box

Reviews.Title: Better to buy in store!!
Reviews.Author: Christina M. Eggebeen "Beener"
Reviews.Content: Got the TV, and a month later I have red spots in the screen....and there is nothing that I am able to do about it.

Reviews.Title: Great little tv
Reviews.Author: E. Small
Reviews.Content: This is a great little TV for an area such as the kitchen. It comes in handy when cooking and prepping food. It is small yet big enough for a room like that. Picture comes in great, easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Clear picture, nice price, good deal!
Reviews.Author: Mike Pochowski
Reviews.Content: Good deal, great picture, kids happy!  Unit easy to set-up and for an old folk type, that was helpful.  Easy initial programing.

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: Nando
Reviews.Content: after a week of buying it stopped  working over all it was  not what i wanted  the quality was not good

Reviews.Title: Satisfied with product and Amazon
Reviews.Author: richard schollenberger
Reviews.Content: The TV fits perfectly where we intended it to go. The picture and sound are very good.The first TV sent to us was defected. We sent it back to amazon and they sent us a new one in an extremely timely manner.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Robert K. Huie
Reviews.Content: For the money a great tv for the money. Using in spare bedroom for guests! It does what it claims.

Reviews.Title: 15" TV
Reviews.Author: Leon Friedman
Reviews.Content: This was the only 15" TV I could find and it was on Amazon.  The only problem I find is the sound is not equal to those on larger TV's. Other than that, it is a fine TV and the price is unbeatable.  I am glad I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Skyler
Reviews.Content: Great picture for my small workplace! People have complained about the sound quality, but I have no reason to complain. Great TV!

Reviews.Title: ** Junk**  buy something else
Reviews.Author: Buzz
Reviews.Content: I bought this item NEW on December 10th, 2012. It died today January 24th, 2013, after only 44 days.  The first thing I noticed is that the stand for the TV fits very loose and the TV cocks to one side.  You can not make the stand hold the TV straight unless you place a business card or something like it in the stand to fill the gap between the stand and the post on the TV. The remote control is flaky, it works sometimes and not at other times. The speakers sound like an old transistor radio. If you can afford it, try something else.

Reviews.Title: Do not waste your money on it
Reviews.Author: Mashanna Russell
Reviews.Content: Do not waste your money to buy this piece of junk.The sound is absolutely terrible!!, the remote does not operate properly,when switching the volume down, the volume goes up.The picture is not that great,

Reviews.Title: now, you know i love tv
Reviews.Author: Sharon Chauvet "sassyswassy"
Reviews.Content: i simply love,love,love my new t.v. just the perfect size for my r.v., if takeing a trip, otherwise, its near me in computer room

Reviews.Title: Decent television for the price
Reviews.Author: Howard Thompson
Reviews.Content: Got a new TV for my apartment. Didn't have much money, but I was able to spring for this model for about $100 dollars. I didn't need too big of a television and this fits well in my apartment. Looks pretty good so far, but I haven't really tested any real good HD stuff on it yet.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: IVAN QUEZADA
Reviews.Content: very nice, very acurace, very good, fast shiping, Good descriptions, its great, excellent...ready

Reviews.Title: CobyLEDTV
Reviews.Author: Tatianna Hays
Reviews.Content: I like it but......it turns on randomly.  This started happening after using it for 2 weeks.  I have checked all the settings and cant figure out what is making this happen.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: This Tv functions well and looks good.  I got it on sale for a great price, but still had to take one star off for the sound being weak/tinny.

Reviews.Title: Coby 23 inch HDTV.
Reviews.Author: Michael S. Clarkston
Reviews.Content: We have this TV for over a year and other then a bit tiney sound it has been very reliable and has a good picture, a good buy at Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Coby LEDTV1526
Reviews.Author: Norman R. Fortier
Reviews.Content: You have to stand or sit directly in front to see a good picture. After running for a period of time, the picture quality drops. I would nor recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: quit working in less than 30 days
Reviews.Author: shannon
Reviews.Content: I was very happy to get this TV on black Friday at an amazingly low price. The TV was very nice looking and had a quality picture and decent sound (better than I expected based on reviews). I did immediately have issues with the remote when it would not program with my cable box and the power function on the remote was nearly impossible to use. Those issues aside the TV worked great.... FOR 28 days.... then it would not power on! EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTING.. thankfully amazon had my back and I was able to return it for a full refund.

Reviews.Title: Coby 19-inch
Reviews.Author: G Tinsley
Reviews.Content: I didn't realize I ordered a 19-inch.  It was small or where I wanted to put it.  It was delivered in it's own box and in good condition.  I kept it even though it was small.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Rob N
Reviews.Content: My only quibble is that there is only a VGA computer input, no DVI.  If it had that, I would give it 5 stars both as a monitor and a TV.

Reviews.Title: satisfied with Coby 23 inch TV
Reviews.Author: servando s. gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Just the right size for my RV. Picture perfect but sound could be better. It picked up many channels including HDs.

Reviews.Title: A steal for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this off one of the lightning deals before Christmas.  It was under $100.  You just cannot find a full HD, LED backlit TV for that price to top it.

Reviews.Title: 19 inch
Reviews.Author: Trayday
Reviews.Content: TV plays great! My daughter wanted a smaller screen to take off to college with her and she really likes it.

Reviews.Title: coby 15 in tv
Reviews.Author: Harry Whately
Reviews.Content: coby 15 in tvFits where I wanted it to, and is clear as a bell.received on time and in perfect shape

Reviews.Title: Missing piece
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Although the tv seems to be a great one & at a decent price, it was unfortunate that we had to go and buy a wall mount for this because the (unopened) box did not have the actual tv stand (platform) in it anywhere. So, what we thought would be a simple set up, turned into a stall and additional purchase. UGH!

Reviews.Title: terrible and no response to complaint
Reviews.Author: chelsie
Reviews.Content: I wrote that iw as unhappy with the tv no one got back to me I wanted to return it they don't care

Reviews.Title: Gift for Grandson
Reviews.Author: Penelope Curran "Daisy"
Reviews.Content: He has it set up in his room.  Takes up very little space.  He can watch movies, play games and stream netflix to it.  He is very happy.

Reviews.Title: Review for Coby LEDTV2326
Reviews.Author: Gail D Keith
Reviews.Content: I like the TV.  This is the first flat screen tv I have purchased so it is so very different from the older models that had the picture tube.  The sound is better, the picture is better so watching tv is enjoyable.  It is so very light and easy to manage and takes so little room.  I am not familiar with the COBY brand, but am very happy with my purchase.  I would recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Mike Murrian
Reviews.Content: Very nice, small TV, use it as confidence monitor for sports television. Nice clear, bright image that is viewable from angle

Reviews.Title: Great tv--great price!
Reviews.Author: Timothy S. Nye
Reviews.Content: Love this tv!  Got them for my teenagers.  Perfect size, lightweight and terrific picture!  And the price was right as well!

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: KIMBERLY BRUNNER
Reviews.Content: Got this for my step son and he loves it... Has good quality sound and picture! A nice gift for him to take when he goes off to college.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: mia
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift. The price was nice for the size and it's just what she wanted for her room.

Reviews.Title: Coby rating
Reviews.Author: stephen greenstein
Reviews.Content: Expected a much clearer picture very disappointed Wish I spent more I And got a better TV. Glad it was just for the kitchen

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy Colby TV's
Reviews.Author: clemdogie
Reviews.Content: Purchased a 32inch TV for my Grandaughter and almost to the date of warranty expiration the TV went out! so unless you purchase an extented warranty Do not buy!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Horrible!
Reviews.Author: Katherine
Reviews.Content: Got this TV for Christmas. I thought it was perfect because all I wanted it for was my dorm room so I could watch movies, TV shows, and Netflix off of my computer.It was okay. It did what I wanted it too so I was happy. Every time I unplugged it and plugged it back in, it made a strange and annoying sound, but I thought "Okay, I can live with this. You get what you pay for"Then after taking it to my dorm room and unpacking it, it was just dead.No lights, no picture, no sound. NOTHING!I unplugged and re-plugged it about 10 times. Tried buttons, tried the remote. Tried different outlets. Tried just leaving it alone for a while. BUT STILL NOTHING!I am very disappointed and now I have to exchange it or return it for something else. Hopefully that will work!

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for the kitchen
Reviews.Author: Corey W. Ratzlaff
Reviews.Content: I ended up choosing this model because of the size and price. Easy to set up and it works great!

Reviews.Title: Good picture, bad sound
Reviews.Author: Eric T. Jones "Skippy"
Reviews.Content: Bought on a black friday deal for super cheap and overall I'm happy with my purchase.  The picture is good and works well as a bedroom tv, the sound, as others have said is pretty bad, but it does have a mini-stereo output, so I can plug in a computer speaker system and be good to go.

Reviews.Title: Good item with reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Pom
Reviews.Content: It is a good one and a right choice for me. I also recommend everyone to purchase for this item if you need it.

Reviews.Title: Coby LEDTV2326 23-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV/Monitor (Black)
Reviews.Author: C. Deasy
Reviews.Content: With all the negative reviews I was leery about buying this TV.  However, for the price I figured I couldn't pass up the deal.  The picture is great, even without HD service to the TV.  It looks nice as well.  I will agree with some of the reviews with regards to the sound, it is not great but again this is not a high end TV so I did not expect a high end sound (thus the 4 stars though).  The volume is sufficient, as I have it on the wall in my kitchen and can hear it from wherever I am in the kitchen (and I have a fairly large kitchen).  So overall, I feel that the purchase was a good buy.  I have had the TV for more than a month and watch it 3 or 4 times a week.  So am am interested in the long term quality, but so far I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: Great picture, easy setup, great price. Bought it for work to replace old tube type tv and converter box. Plugged in antenna hit auto tune and watching the news at noon in HD.

Reviews.Title: Coby LEDTV1926 19-inch 720p LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: jenn15377
Reviews.Content: This tv was bought for my son to play his video games on. It works quite well. It has a wonderful picture and perfect sound.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Deborah Morris
Reviews.Content: very pleased with the product and how quickly it was sent to me without any damage to the tv.my daughter loves it!!!

Reviews.Title: me llego este producto malo, estafadores, quiero de vuelta mi dinero
Reviews.Author: nathaly garcia
Reviews.Content: Este producto sera enviado para venezuela, agradeceria sea embalado en unacaja pequeña, porque sino el costo del envio seria demasiado costosomuchas gracias

Reviews.Title: A waste of money
Reviews.Author: S. Collier
Reviews.Content: Tv never worked. Out of the box, plugged it in. It came on and turned itself off. Tried multiple times.

Reviews.Title: Dope
Reviews.Author: Thug life
Reviews.Content: This tv is vary good and a good price! Buyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy ittttt!!!!!!!!!! If have the money haha. You can buy this for like ur grandma or son or even for u

Reviews.Title: colby ledtv 19 inch  awesome buy
Reviews.Author: Bertha Jones
Reviews.Content: great buy sleek order arrived on time. picture great, easy setup, I bought this for my daughter room and believe it this tv has more than i expected

Reviews.Title: Slow operation
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: TV Is slow for changing channels and turning on and off.  It loses its digital channeling easy.  We have to watch tv through satellite all the time as the digital box is week.  We have an antenna mounted on the house and do not have problems with any other tv in the house.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Breining
Reviews.Content: great tv my son is very happy !! I am glad I took  shot at a name I hadn't used before!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality
Reviews.Author: Mary Smith
Reviews.Content: The television was a Christmas gift and the person receiving the gift called and told me that the quality was excellent and that he was very pleased with his gift. It was a very good value and I would highly recommend this television.

Reviews.Title: coby ledtv 1526 15 in. t v
Reviews.Author: Cletus Loeffelholz
Reviews.Content: it fit under the kitchen cabinet the way we wanted  it to. has good color and setting are easy to reset

Reviews.Title: Great little TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: James S. Whitcraft
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use as a monitor in my home office.  It's perfect.  Setup was 3 minutes.  I also connected an HD anntenna so that I get the local channels free - it gets 42 digital channels.

Reviews.Title: I will never, ever bu electronics from Amazon again!
Reviews.Author: Shawna Reppert
Reviews.Content: Product arrived without screws needed to attach product to base.  Amazon cannot provide those screw, which means I will need to call Coby and see how many hoops I need to jump through to get the screws. . .assuming I can reach them, since their hours are the same hours I work.  Or I could return the TV, assuming I can manage to get the thing back into the original packaging (which I cannot)  And then wait to see if Amazon ships me a TV with all the parts, or go through this all over again.  Waaaay more stress than I need to deal with.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: David Morgan
Reviews.Content: Got this for my kids room and it turned out to be a decent television for the price I am satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Perfect budget TV for my son's bedroom
Reviews.Author: mckaylively
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my son's room as a Christmas gift.  The TV has a budget friendly price for an LED screen.  I have no complaints about this TV.  The picture is clear, colors are true and bright, and the volume output is good.  I would purchase this TV again with no second thought.

Reviews.Title: LedTV
Reviews.Author: penny
Reviews.Content: This product has never worked with the remote control.  I kept it however, because it is just one of my TV's  that I have in the kitchen.  My husband and son do not like it at all.

Reviews.Title: A good tv
Reviews.Author: Michael Mattox
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son's room to watch and play video games on. I Have been pleased with the performance of this set, very good picture and color. Sound quality is not that bad for a small tv.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: kellie m fitzpatrick
Reviews.Content: Picture quality ok but sound is terrible. It sounds like your listening to a old transistor radio. I hooked up some computer speakers to it and it sounds ok now. Bought for my kitchen and needed to add extra high quality attena to get reception and still it only get about 5 channels.

Reviews.Title: great price
Reviews.Author: tmarks
Reviews.Content: nice, compact tv with a good picture. This is a second tv for the bedroom and we' 're considering getting a larger one for the living room. Great value!

Reviews.Title: it is just awesome for the price .
Reviews.Author: SANDRA ARROYO
Reviews.Content: it great for the price.for the size.can be used as a monitor also. very lightweight. easy to connect to the cable.

Reviews.Title: stopped working after one week of little use
Reviews.Author: William MacDuff
Reviews.Content: This TV was wall mounted and lasted about a week of being on maybe 1hr a day for 4-5 days. First the picture went and then the sound stopped.  Amazon was great about replacing it with another TV.  Hopefully, this Coby holds up.

Reviews.Title: Great television at a great price.
Reviews.Author: Diana Leonard
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing deal, I couldn't buy a 19" television for what I paid for this 23", and the picture is great, With all the different connections available my son was able to hook all his video games at the same time.

Reviews.Title: Coby LED TV
Reviews.Author: Jodelle Albers
Reviews.Content: Left on front of my door in original box for anyone to see and take. Thankfully no one did. Did not work at all when plugged in

Reviews.Title: Bad sound system
Reviews.Author: William J. Lynch
Reviews.Content: The good picture quality and value price are over taken by a totally terrible sound system. I tried it out on several people who can hear well and all said they could not make out the dialogue because the "tin" type sound. I had to return it within a week of purchase.

Reviews.Title: good for the money
Reviews.Author: Julie patrick
Reviews.Content: its ok for the money, but only one port makes it difficult to hook up dish receiver and blue ray player or game console, have to switch out the cable each time.

Reviews.Title: TV does NOT have a clear picture at all
Reviews.Author: Robin Tompkins
Reviews.Content: I had to go buy a completely other tv , Because it was a christmas present and when we hooked it up the picture was nothing but fuzzy!!!! First time and LAST time buyer of amazon.com !!!!!  Never again, this was a sexcond rate piece of eguipment. Very unhappy.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: maryhowcouldugo
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV on Black Friday and it came the following Tues. Bought it for my 12 yr old son who likes to game a lot and it's perfect for him. I've used it to watch TV and I've read reviews about the sound quality issues, but I have no problems with it. It's quite loud actually, but we also have a quiet household. You won't get bass out of it, but overall, it sounds great and you can always hook speakers up to it. I might order another soon. Too bad the price went up. It was $89.00 on BF. I have a bigger TV in my living room and knew not to expect that kind of quality, but it def met my expectations.  I also bought the 2 year warranty and my total was still under $95. I say it's worth the purchase.

Reviews.Title: The TV turned itself on.
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: The TV was purchased for use in the spare bedroom.The picture was OK for a 19 inch TVThe sound was odd, it had an artifical quality to it, but it was good enough for an inexpensive TV.The tuner did not pick up all the stations available coming through on the cable analog signal, but it picked up most of them.But the real problem was that the TV would occasionally turn itself on and it was in a room with no other electronics and no people in it.  Several times I walked by the room and heard noises and found the TV on.The problem could have been the TV or the remote control, I didn't bother to try and diagnose the problem.I kept the TV for a week and then returned it.I would not recomend this item.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Sassy
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews & my purchase was just what I expected. I'm using it in my bedroom & it is the perfect size.

Reviews.Title: Nice, cheap tv
Reviews.Author: mgs2379
Reviews.Content: Got this on Black Friday for $80 and even though it's a small, cheap tv it's pretty decent for the price.  My living room tv is a Panasonic TC-P50ST50 plasma which is just an amazing tv for a reasonable price considering the size and quality, and this Coby is nowhere near the same level of picture or build quality... but an $80 tv for the kitchen or guest room or workout area was a no-brainer and I'm very satisfied with this for the price.

Reviews.Title: Horrid quality
Reviews.Author: LaVerne Wolgast
Reviews.Content: I am returning this item due to very poor picture quality!!!!Color is very bad, and faces look fuzzy. Worked with techsupport, but it didn't help.

Reviews.Title: A Great Value!
Reviews.Author: Steven Porter "webfeat"
Reviews.Content: This is the second Coby LED TV I've purchased, and am extremely pleased with the picture quality, ease of set-up, reliability, and value of the product. I connected a Roku Streaming Player and my cable feed and only use it for video playback, so I cannot speak to refresh rates for gaming.

Reviews.Title: Good, quality little tv
Reviews.Author: mitchmille
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as an additional tv set in my office to keep on while doing work. It works like a champ. Good quality picture for digital channels (so-so on analog tv channels). It's a good little tv for the price I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: Review
Reviews.Author: Marcia Finney
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying the coby LEDTV1926 19inch.  It is just the right sizes for my bedroom.  This TV will be good for any one's bedroom or kitchen.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: martina brinson
Reviews.Content: the picture is fantastic and it came on time  this is the first electronic item I have gotten from amazon but based on this I would buy them again

Reviews.Title: nice tv for the size and cost
Reviews.Author: John Butcher
Reviews.Content: like that it has multiple connections, it has a sharp picture, and excellent size for our daughters rooms, really good price

Reviews.Title: Glad I purchased this.
Reviews.Author: Glendia Ramey
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality. Excellent price. Works perfectly. Stunning HD picture on tv. Would absolutely recomend this.Can't go wrong! My girl loves it.

Reviews.Title: good tv for the money
Reviews.Author: Gerard Griffin
Reviews.Content: not a great tv but good value for the money, especially at the sale price. use in kitchen at breakfast counter. works fine for catching news before going to work.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Ann Marie Scharpenberg
Reviews.Content: We love it.  I got it so my son can play his xbox on it, its very user friendly and easy to install other devices.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Rhonda
Reviews.Content: This was the Perfect size of tv to complete my husbands man cave! I got two of them! Nice picture too!

Reviews.Title: Power button doesnt work on first day
Reviews.Author: J. Camacho
Reviews.Content: The quality of the picture but I have not heard the speakers because I use this as a 2nd computer monitor. The problem is that the power button broke on the first day and the only way to power and shut down is using the remote. Stay tuned for results from my 90 day warranty claim

Reviews.Title: Great buy.
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift for a relative. They were were pleased by the high quality picture provided w/a smaller screen size.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal For TV
Reviews.Author: Diego
Reviews.Content: Came quickly, price is nice for the quality. My nephew loves his new TV. I would recommended this product. A Good Buy.

Reviews.Title: This purchase is a blessing! love love love
Reviews.Author: *peggy*
Reviews.Content: This was a christmas gift to my husband. This product was given 5 stars due to several reasons.  The product arrived quickly. TV was easy to set up to our dish network. The picture is so clear and crisp until we literally look like we are  in the movie. He put the tv in his "man cave". There is not anything that he dislike about this tv, I would recommend this tv again and again. My husband also loves that he can use this product is a monitor for his laptop or computer. I was so happy with the price of this purchase. The TV can well compete with other brands.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Rachael "skfan"
Reviews.Content: Enjoy watching and playing games on it! The tv is light and compact enough that I can move it easily whenever I choose to.

Reviews.Title: weak audio, tinney sound
Reviews.Author: Carol Hicks
Reviews.Content: All in all an ok TV for the price.  The audio is poor and sound like it's coming from the bottom of a tin can.  Luck is that my use of this 19" is right in front of me at my work station.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: i got this as a gift for a friend for christmas and he loves it . great picture on the screen really suprised.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Sdurst
Reviews.Content: We bought this tv on a lightning deal for our teenage daughter. It works great for her bedroom and we were very pleased with the features.

Reviews.Title: Tv 19"
Reviews.Author: Frankieg
Reviews.Content: We use in kitchen, works very well in the morning, in our breakfeast nook, We highley recomend this product, thank you, for your great service.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Dozer189
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV because it was a lightning deal for $78.  Hung it in my 2 year olds room so we wouldn't have to worry about him tipping over the tube style TV that he had.  Mounted out of his reach and it is a space saver that way as well.The picture is not as good as on my VIZIO HD TV in the living room. All around not the greatest quality but the price was right and he is only watching cartoons on it so no big deal.If you are looking for a high quality HD picture this is not what you are looking for. If you want a small extra TV for a kids room at a cheap price this is it.

Reviews.Title: 90 degree angle required
Reviews.Author: DAN
Reviews.Content: Price was right and features OK, but the picture is bad unless you are looking from directly in front of the screen.  Sound is tinny, noticeable when you first turn it on, but you forget about it in a minute.

Reviews.Title: christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: was mush better than i thought it would be. color and picture are great,for such a small size sound fills the room its in ... should  have gotten the mounting setbut even free standing its great

Reviews.Title: Not a monitor.....
Reviews.Author: jdk
Reviews.Content: It is a decent tv the picture is nice refresh rate is "meh", but THIS IS NOT A MONITOR. It's native resolution is 720p that was the first problem. Second was the brightness. The lighting is inadequacy to bring the brightness needed in a high resolution gaming monitor. The high frames per second used in games kill this monitor. I have had it freeze, hang, then turn itself off. Several times.Not to mention No DVI port. it has VGA.. i didn't even know the had VGA anymore. I thought that died in the year 2000. Either way it now serves as a present to a friend. completely useless to me.

Reviews.Title: Great Upgrade!
Reviews.Author: Kurt Brobst "game expert"
Reviews.Content: I got this tv for an upgrade for a bigger screen and it works great with my new game console. I recommend this tv for anyone who wants a nice tv for your game systems.

Reviews.Title: Bad sound
Reviews.Author: Blommel
Reviews.Content: Great picture, but had to use old computer speakers for good sound.  TV sound was like a tin can.  Other wise it is great.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: Pros:Good pictureLots of plugs in the back for video game systems, DVD/blu-ray players etc.Cons:Remote and TV are slow to respond.

Reviews.Title: it was worth the price.  I needed it for a small studio and it works fine
Reviews.Author: Fred Wardak
Reviews.Content: it was worth the price.  I needed it for a small studio and it works fine for me.  Althought the resoulution is that high, but the color and contrast are good.

Reviews.Title: its better than nothing.and was certainly cheap
Reviews.Author: Nick Wilson
Reviews.Content: the tv works fine..running my ps3 and computer into it displaying 1080p..but as some people have already metiond it does have a dead pixel near the mid left portion...and its a complete eyesore..sometimes i dont notice it but then others it completely stands out.

Reviews.Title: all ok
Reviews.Author: Veronica
Reviews.Content: all ok i love this, The TV is in good condition and the colors are super good definition'm happy with my purchase

Reviews.Title: Great for a small size area
Reviews.Author: D. Lundy
Reviews.Content: TV was placed into my toddler's room which is the perfect size. This tv is used everyday so I needed something that would last. Great picture, was worth the money!

Reviews.Title: power automatic on ?
Reviews.Author: Robert Shen
Reviews.Content: The product I received has a very strange problem. I turned it off before I went to the bed in the night. It woke me up at 6:10am like an alarm radio. It repeated this problem twice before I decided to pull the plug every time I intended to turn it off for a few hours.

Reviews.Title: Smaller than I expected but picture is good
Reviews.Author: Patricia
Reviews.Content: This was smaller than I expected, (more like 18 in.) But, it gets a good picture and for the price was a deal.  I would think twice if you are buying it even for a bedroom though.  Go for the 22 in. at least.  If it is for a kitchen it is fine.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for a small room
Reviews.Author: Dan Winfield
Reviews.Content: I have a small guest room and this tv is perfect. Picture and sound were great.  I would want a bigger tv is the room was any bigger but from the bed it is just fine.

Reviews.Title: It's ok.
Reviews.Author: J.
Reviews.Content: Nothing special, nothing over the top.  It's just your average t.v.  I bought this as a monitor for my desktop PC .  The problem with it is the screen is hard to adjust to.  The coloring is very weird.....  I'm just hoping that this product will last long.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: John W. Duff
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A VERY GOOD TV WITH SURPRISING COLOR AND PICTURE.  YOU CANNOT BEAT THE PRICE.  VERY EASY SETUP.  WOULD RECOMEND.

Reviews.Title: Coby TV
Reviews.Author: Jamebo
Reviews.Content: hard to mount as a TV, it has poor visual quality if you are not looking at it directly face on at eye level.I would not purchase this again.

Reviews.Title: GREAT value
Reviews.Author: Vivien Swaren
Reviews.Content: Great for the kitchen.  Very lightweight, was a snap to connect and set up. Also got the pivotal hanging support which is a plus.

Reviews.Title: It is what it is
Reviews.Author: Michael Sullivan
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for $88, and at that price I have to give it a good review.It is very light weight, and it does exactly what it says it does except one thing....It claims to be 1080P, but it is not the native resolution. I think it just downgrades things that are 1080P down to 720P, which on this small of a screen is fine for videos, but as a computer monitor does not look that good (can't read text easily).But if you are just trying to watch some videos in your kitchen, this will be great.Also, I have not had this long, so I can not speak to its longevity.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price
Reviews.Author: Rock Man
Reviews.Content: Great little TV that we have mounted under a kitchen cabinet. Very lightweight. Sadly, can't take advantage of the HD as we are not using a full cable box with it. There is a way to do it for some channels with a cable switch but not interested.

Reviews.Title: Colby 19' LED TV
Reviews.Author: Richard D Cutter
Reviews.Content: Purchased to use a a computer monitor as advertised.  It will come up, but can not use as a monitor.  The TV works just fine, but I don't need another TV.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: albyp
Reviews.Content: Set works nicely but I was disappointed that the audio output connection slots were incompatible with my wireless audio headset.

Reviews.Title: Bad TV
Reviews.Author: Howard Donsky
Reviews.Content: The picture & sound quality are extremly poor, one loacal channel will not even work.How do I go about returning the TV.

Reviews.Title: very nice set for price
Reviews.Author: Donald J Drexinger
Reviews.Content: The set met my expatations, only problem was finding screw to attach base, never thought to look at base of TV for it.

Reviews.Title: Wish I had bought two instead of just one
Reviews.Author: Razorback Willie
Reviews.Content: Great TV, super price (lighting deal) only regret is not purchasing two at the time since there hasn't been another "lighting deal" even close to this one.  OK, Coby isn't a brand that you'll find at the top of the charts, but it works, has a great display and was very inexpensive - plus it uses about one tenth of the electricity as the old CRT type TV it replaced.  Son is happy and now Goodwill will get a good working TV donated.

Reviews.Title: Coby 19inch tv
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Horrible picture not worth the $100 we paid for it. My 20 year old tv has a better picture than this tv!!!!!

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: P. Stubbs
Reviews.Content: i took a peek at the tv is looks nice and of course its super slim i wanted to keep it for muself but i bought it for a gift for someone but i will be getting my own

Reviews.Title: great for price
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: i love this TV but only for the reason that it was so cheep, sure the sound is a little weird but its not a big deal, the picture is awesome with an HDMI cable so i recommend this greatly to anyone thats cheep like me and want good picture

Reviews.Title: Don't try to use this as a monitor
Reviews.Author: Bill from Mountain View "chinacatdawg"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use this as a monitor in my home entertainment system as a display for my Mac Mini.  All I wanted was a cheap 15" HDMI monitor to run iTunes.  Bad idea. The sharpness was not good at all. I returned it.  I can't comment on how it is as a TV.

Reviews.Title: Average
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: Got it for a decent price, and will do for now. Not a brand I would usually go for, but it seems to be doing ok for now

Reviews.Title: Great for Afghanistan
Reviews.Author: kyree nock
Reviews.Content: Perfect if you want an TV for your room but dont want anything to big in you room and the price was amazing is so clear, I have my laptop and PS3 hooked up to it at the same time.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: Wadey Potatey
Reviews.Content: Great picture and perfect size for a bedroom.  Only thing I don't like is the remote is kind-of big. I still gave it five stars because I was pretty sure when I ordered it that I wasn't going to like the size of the remote.

Reviews.Title: Cheapest monitor I could find...
Reviews.Author: Nic P
Reviews.Content: I was looking on black friday for a cheap computer monitor to replace my old 17" LCD. I was surprised to find this TV to be cheaper than any monitor so I picked it up for $78.I really like the sleek look of the bezel. Looks great on my desk. I have external speakers for my computer so I can't comment on the sound quality that others complained about.I use the HDMI connection to my new computer and it looks great!I did notice that the TV shuts itself off if the computer goes to sleep (no input) which is a nice feature as well.As I said I'm using it for my computer monitor so I can't comment on most of the TV's features, but was a great black friday deal for me!

Reviews.Title: Defective TV
Reviews.Author: S B
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV as a lightening deal on Black Friday. I was very excited about the great deal to replace an old tube tv in our bedroom. Unfortunately, this TV had to be returned. There were 2 problems 1) the sound quality and 2) there was a problem with the TV's power - on 2 occasions it actually turned itself on, once while we were sleeping!1) The sound - I read prior reviews and was not really concerned about the sound quality. Yes, it's bad, but that wasn't a deal-breaker for me. Had this been the only problem, I would have kept the TV. However, the sounds is very tinny and annoying, even in my small bedroom.2) The power issue - I have done a little research and this seems to be a problem that other's have had. The TV turned itself on on at least two occasions. This was a dealbreaker. On one occasion it turned itself on after we had gone to sleep.If it hadn't been for these two issues, the TV itself is nice. The picture is okay, the TV is lightweight and easy to set-up, etc. The box was pretty banged up when I received it, but I'll blame that on the shipping process.Unfortunately, it was my concern that this TV would eventually break down within a short period of time that led me to return it. Especially concerning the problems I was having early on and the short warrenty on the product. Trust the other reviews on this one. It's a risky buy.

Reviews.Title: Poor Sound
Reviews.Author: dfreemtg
Reviews.Content: The picture quality isnt too bad its avg at best . The back av panel is horrible 1 hdmi jack 1 component jack 1 av jack no digital audio jack and no good way to hook up a stand alone stereo system with out a cable/satellite box in between  to get a better sound quality.Speaking of the sound, Its the absolute worse i have ever heard . Flat out bad , sounds like its semi muted in a hallway . Just pure garbage. Ya know you get what you pay for. Buyer beware

Reviews.Title: Cheap, perfect for kids or spare tv
Reviews.Author: Wix
Reviews.Content: I have this tv set up in my exercise room. I have one of those ancient treadmills that didn't come equipped with a flat screen tv, so this fit the bill as an inexpensive tv to keep my mind occupied as I tick off the miles on my Nordictrack and my Schwinn Bike. It has enough inputs for basic use, it easy to set up, is reasonably priced, and easily wall mounted.Perfect for a kid's room or spare room. The colors and sound are passable and the TV has met expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Darlene Carroll
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a lightning deal on Black Friday for our son's room.  It came quickly and as a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Bought With NCP.Com Points, FORGET-ABOUT-IT !
Reviews.Author: Amazon13
Reviews.Content: I belong to a consumer panel online which award you points for transmitting consumer purchases each week. I needed a TV for my bedroom and thought that this one looked great and would workout. I used over 168,000 points for this beautiful piece of "CRAP". After taking it out of the box, I discovered that there was no power cord in the box. Due to the fact that I had waited more than 30 days to report this Coby refused to send me a power cord. I contacted the NCP group and they were able to get me a power cord, it took a while but I did get one, eventually.The TV is the worst product that I've even purchased from anywhere in "America". It states on the box that it was made in "CHINA" yet another reason not to buy this brand... Cheap... Cheap... Cheap, everything about it is cheap. The remote control is a piece of worthless plastic that functions sometimes and sometimes not. You have to scan for channels every other day unless you have an outside antenna, which I don't, but I purchased an antenna inline booster with a bidirectional capability. Even with that it's ability to locate channels when scanning is awful.I can't believe that this company is still in business due to it's poor customer service and the people who work their, extremely lackadaisicalness in their attempt to assist customers. It's like they know that nothing is going to happen if they give you lousy service. The sound goes off at will and you must turn the TV off and back on to get the sound back. I'm going to purchase me another TV for my bedroom and I assure you that it won't be by "COBY". This is why companies in "AMERICA" need to bring back manufacturing of TV's back to America. "MADE IN AMERICA"

Reviews.Title: COBY LEDTV
Reviews.Author: loretta cooper
Reviews.Content: I love my new Coby LEDTV.  It's just the right size and the picture and the digital tuning is fantastic!  I got a great deal on this purchase!

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: cdc
Reviews.Content: had my 40" Coby for 1 year and 1 month, or course 1 month past the warrenty.  it went complety out no sound no pic nothing.  Called Coby and they pretty much said sorry cant help.  I sent it to a guy to have it looked at and he found the problem by couldnt get the part.  Stay away from this brand of TV it is junk.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: This TV is in good shape it came out of the box easily and was easily set up. I got the 19 inch 720p and the display looks very nice with DVDs. I use it in my bedroom and sound quality is awesome and I don't know why everybody complains just one problem with the sound, when i plug it into the right speaker and it makes a loud buzzing noise so I just keep it unplugged out of that it's that easy. There's not much more I can say.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for Gaming
Reviews.Author: Russell "YT: Demonictalent"
Reviews.Content: I'm a Gamer, but I'm not rich so i looked for a deal. I replaced a 32" TV with this TV in the 23" version.The picture is just amazing quality, I also use my laptop on this TV and it's very nice. The 1080p is very nice, the colors are brilliant (I use Vivid).  The sound is ok, but if you are a gamer you can just use a gaming headset, other wise buy speakers, or a sound bar.  Also, when the TV is at a black screen you can see bright spots along the edge of the TV, although it doesn't matter. They disappear when it leaves the black screen.I'll update this if anything happens to the TV.UPDATE: Tv still works amazing 1 week after I received it. I registered my TC at the Coby website and it has a 90 day warranty, and if it break out the the waranty, it'll cost $20 to send it in and get the parts replace/repaired. not a bad deal.UPDATE: 3 months, still great.  Although I noticed while the dryer is running in the room adjacent to mine, small lines will sometimes flicker across the screen.  I believe this is probably due to tiny shockwaves.  In other word, if you live in an area with many shockwaves (california) this TV is probably not to you as it seems very sensitive.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS TV
Reviews.Author: SDaisy79
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for our son on cyber Monday. I didn't expect to get outstanding sound or much else, for the price. What I wanted was a working TV. I hooked up this TV on Dec. 28th. At first, everything was great. Our son loved it! Then, the next day it would not turn on. It finally came on. Now it suddenly starts to squeal loudly, like the snow sound on the old televisions. This happens about every 20 mins or so. Got fed up and now I am returning it. Exactly, one week after recieving it. Lesson learned... Don't go too cheap, even if you are not in the market for quality. I would not recommend this TV to anyone!!!

Reviews.Title: Decent for the price, but may need to be returned
Reviews.Author: goinggone14
Reviews.Content: The television produces good image quality with decent speakers given the size of it. Larger televisions, and higher quality brands will look and sound marginally better, but this TV serves a purpose. If you only need this for limited viewing in a kitchen, or some other low-value viewing situation, than this TV is a bargain for under $100. If you're relying on it for viewing movies, gaming, or sports entertainment, perhaps in a living room or den, then you should go elsewhere or get a bigger, 1080 television.The drawback to my particular TV was that it arrived with one pixel dead in the top right corner. This was not obtrusive given its location and due to the fact that it wasn't visible for most colors (it was especially evident on a black screen). I would expect that this happens with a number of televisions, and it's simply a factory defect. Nevertheless, it seems to be a common problem.

Reviews.Title: Package arrived so badly damaged.
Reviews.Author: Khan nguyen
Reviews.Content: Package was so dirty and badly damaged that I was afraid to look inside. The item turn out alright, so I didn't bother to film a complaint. So far it is working fine. The resolution doesn't seem very clear though and hurt my eyes after a few minutes of usage. I am using it as a monitor.

Reviews.Title: Mfgr won't honor warranty
Reviews.Author: A. Soven
Reviews.Content: The TV, with a 90-day parts-and-labor warranty,  was  purchased 8/13/12 and stopped working on 11/8/12.  I phoned Coby on that day to report the failure, and was advised  that  Coby does not maintain a service center in California (as required by  California law) and to ship the item at my expense to Savannah Georgia. Reluctantly,  I shipped the item at my expense from Tarzana California to Savannah Georgia, and was then advised by letter that the  TV was not covered by the 90-day parts and service  warranty. (I assume because it arrived "late.")  I would not buy any Coby product, and don't know why anyone would buy a product that must be shipped 2000 miles to be repaired under the warranty, and must arrive within the warranty period.).

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Gift Card "mimberly15906"
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I got this tv I have no problems with it it's the best tv I've ever had and  I bought it at such a reasonableE price thanks amazon

Reviews.Title: Great tv  for ps3
Reviews.Author: Jesse
Reviews.Content: I never seen such a clear tv its perfect for video games  I like it I'm giving a four because the audio it's okay

Reviews.Title: inside of the componet cracked
Reviews.Author: SC
Reviews.Content: I recieved this delivery yesterday afternoon from Santa. AFTER reading thie reviews AFTER purchasing the Coby LED TV 1526 15 inch LED TV 720 P 60H2 w/ HDMI, I was thinking MAYBE I will fall into the lucky bell curve of the top 50% effective televisions. NOPE! This was a Christmas gift. After reading the complaints, I felt compelled to test the TV out before I wrapped the gift. I was ok with the TV not being perfect such as the TV's angle, they way it sounds, not the perfect color. I mean, you get what you pay for. Anyway, the inside of the screen was cracked. Meaning, when you turned on the TV, the screen looked liked someone stuck thier fingers in blue and black paint, and flicked thier fingers and made splatter marks therfore leaving a cracked apperance. Fine, you get what you pay for. It wasnt until I called a company in Illiones, that bounced me too Coby. COBY wanted DID NOT WANT to accept any responability and threw be back to Amazon. (whom I have not contacted at this point) I have a feeling, Amazon is only going to do one, of two things 1) send me back to Coby or 2) they send it back to Coby for me. (which may charge shipping fee's of 50.00) uh, why bother reurning a TV, that you paid 80.00 bucks for only, to send the TV back for 50.00 dollars in shipping. Chalk it up as a lost. peorid. Is it really worth the aggervation? I can handle a broken TV. However the unprofessionalsim, and not wanting to accept the responability for anything. They were RUDE RUDE RUDE RUDE...so I can send the TV back for 50.00 bucks wait 6-8 weeks to fix then they will send it back. Amazom is great. I have no problem with them, when I have had, very little, minor problems, Amazom is nice, extremly professional and resolves the problem and is not rude..I would never buy or reccomend buying a prodcut from this company ever again. GO SOME WHERE ELSE ANOTHER COMPANY..DO NOT BUY FROM COBY..OR SPEND THE RXTRA 30.00 bucks for a TV from a reptuable company even of Label as long as they a professional.

Reviews.Title: the tv lasted 3 months... never buy coby
Reviews.Author: Gonzalo I. Jacome "Gonzalo I. Jacome"
Reviews.Content: it really bothers me when a product dies too quickly.... do not buy this tv.. get a better brand. I really hate to know that this is really bad quality

Reviews.Title: Good but not great
Reviews.Author: hangman
Reviews.Content: I'll preface this review with I've only had the product for a day, but these are my initial observations:Picture quality:  I've only got this connected through a standard coaxial cable and not an HD cable box.  But the picture is above average when comparing to my 37" Dynex LCD.  So I'm pleased about that.Audio:  I love good sound, and this is far from good sound.  You can listen to it and understand it, but if you think you can get good sound out of speakers that are less than half an inch thick you are mistaken.  As a secondary TV and at the price point it's no better or worse than anything else you will get.Connections:  This is the reason I dinged this TV, all the connections are directly on the back of the TV with the power cable plugging in at a 90 degree angle to the TV screen.  The biggest issue I have with this is that it forces the TV away from the wall by more than an inch.  I was hoping to have the ability to snuggly push it against the wall (with a very thin wall mount) but that's just not possible with this unit.  If you are simply going to use the stand none of this is a concern.Overall I would recommend this TV if you can get it for under $100.  But I just don't see it being worth much more than that.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this
Reviews.Author: qkracer
Reviews.Content: Oh my what a joke...picture quality is fair and that is stretching it....the real problem is audio...]Sorry this is a terrible purchase, mine went back after one day...dont buy it even at the low price it is NOT worth it

Reviews.Title: For our daughter's sitting/reading room
Reviews.Author: Lindsey
Reviews.Content: We purchased a 32 in for our room and was very happy with it, and this one was for our daughters reading room. It's perfect for her small room, and the led screen is much better than expected.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: Dez "Dez"
Reviews.Content: I just received the TV today and set it up. So far so good! Some of the previous reviews had me worried but everything is good so far.  The picture is great and the screen is just the right size for the room I have it in (a small bedroom).  Sound quality is fine.  No complaints so far and I am happy that I got this from a lightening deal! I gave it four stars because I haven't had it very long and haven't used it a whole lot yet. We'll see how it goes.....

Reviews.Title: Purchased in 2012!
Reviews.Author: KBSauer
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. We've not had any issues with it and we purchased it in 2012. I would definitely purchase this TV again.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: erni
Reviews.Content: this little Tv was perfect for what we wanted. works great! for the small areait was needed for. picture perfect! price right.

Reviews.Title: A Question?
Reviews.Author: tlc
Reviews.Content: The little TV is fine, but I do have a question.  After you have scanned the TV and cable channels, how do you save them?  Every time I turn the TV on I have to scan and it takes about 10 minutes.  How do I make these stations the default?  Do you have to do a complete scan EVERY TIME?  Any suggestions?

Reviews.Title: Not much to see here
Reviews.Author: T. Herbert
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these because the monitor in my office stopped working. There is no computer store near me so I went to an electronics store looking for a small tv to use as my computer monitor. I was excited to see this. It was lightwight and had a carry handle on the box. Unfortunately, when I go it to the office it did not work. The power came on but that was it. I could not change the source, couldn't even get a signal for the tv. So I took it back and they hooked a different one up in the store to make sure it worked and gave that to me in exchange. I got back to the office and it worked fine. The only problem was that there is a dead pixel that you notice from the time you turn it on. A little green dot in the screen and this was straight out of the box. I kept it because I did not feel like going back to the store again. Anyway it's a Coby so you get what you pay for. I havent tried it as a tv yet and I probably won't. I have watched some youtube video with it. My LCD at home does a better job picture wise with youtube.

Reviews.Title: Not the Best, But a Good TV for a Small Room or Kid's Playroom
Reviews.Author: Michael Gallagher
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a small, affordable TV for a small room like a bathroom, kitchen, or say a children's play area I would recommend this one.  The picture quality is okay, not great, and does get a little distorted if you are not looking at it directly.  When you are looking at it directly, the picture quality is pretty good.The sound leaves a lot to be desired, and I don't know if that is a function of me being used to the deep / rich sounds of the bigger TV's these days or all that can be generated with a TV of this size.  Now, I'm not going to watch an epic movie on this thing, but if you're watching the news or a kid's show you want to hear quality.There are lots of input jacks on this TV to hookup just about anything you want to hookup.  I have it hooked up directly to the cable line and the room it is in doesn't have space for a DVD player, etc. so I can't comment on that functionality for the unit.

Reviews.Title: Good little tv
Reviews.Author: Jeremylavender
Reviews.Content: The price on this little tv was right,good picture and built-in tuner. All that you need. The remote and menu screens work well also. Can use as pc monitor and game system with hdmi.

Reviews.Title: Coby DVD Player
Reviews.Author: Tom L.
Reviews.Content: I had been looking for a small TV/DVD player for our RV. The Coby looked like it would be the ideal product.  I purchased the Coby with the wall mount.  Used it this last weekend and I must say I am very pleased with the screen and picture quality.  I would recommend this unit to anyone wanting a small set for a very small area.  It is perfect in our small RV.

Reviews.Title: summer home use
Reviews.Author: kadoom
Reviews.Content: Rec'd in good condition!No missing parts! Nice picture,sound a little hollow!Set is a little slow to come on and hard to tell on light change after power button is engaged! Good set for the money

Reviews.Title: Well Satisfied
Reviews.Author: bbrandy119
Reviews.Content: I purchased this small tv for a small kitchen space. Of course, the sound is not like a big set, but it was not purchased with that expectation. The picture quality is great. It is so far working well and is living up to what I expected from it.

Reviews.Title: Barely OK...2 1/2 stars
Reviews.Author: Joe H
Reviews.Content: I confirm what previous reviewers commented on:  terrible sound and narrow optimum viewing angle.  This is a problem when mounting under a cabinet that can't extend the tilt to eye level BUT it's only $99 delivered in two days with Prime and has limited use in the kitchen, so I'm OK with it.  As Bill Parcels used to say "it is what it is"

Reviews.Title: Coby 19 LED
Reviews.Author: AlanL
Reviews.Content: Works good but the sound quality is not the greatest.  Overall great picture quality for the price. Have the HDTV mounted using VideoSecu Wall Mount.

Reviews.Title: can't flat mount!!!
Reviews.Author: TRM
Reviews.Content: I got this Coby LEDTV1526 15" to mount flat / flush on a wall.  The unit accepts VESA brackets (which can be articulating or flush mounts). But the 110v power cord plugs in from the back, not from the bottom or side.  The cord has a big non-flexible plug that requires at least 3" of clearance.  So it's impossible to mount this unit flush to the wall.  Did they not consider that anyone flush mounts LED TVs, or just saved $0.50 using a cheap plug/socket?!  Junk!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Mary G.
Reviews.Content: Purchased to be used in the kitchen on the counter and it has worked just great.  Had a flip down 7 inch T.V. prior and was pleased with it but decided to a little larger one this time. We are pleased with this product and the size.

Reviews.Title: 2 years later, on 24/7 still working.
Reviews.Author: JimmyJoe
Reviews.Content: Two years after purchase, its main use is as a monitor for our surveillance system. It has been on nearly 24/7 and is still going strong. Sound isn't its strong point, but I don't need sound for what I'm using it for.

Reviews.Title: COBY 15" TV
Reviews.Author: MaggieMurphy "m&m;"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for a bedroom and received it very quickly. No problems with the shipping or packaging but... The TV is terrible. It has an awful picture and sound. It has what I call the Xray effect because it turns blacks and grays into a over developed picture look. All settings such as standard, sports, vivid have this problem and to fix it you have to put the brightness up so high it makes the picture bad in another way. The sound is tin and although I knew from reading the reviews that the sound was not all that good I did read the picture was good. It isn't.I got mine on a deal new from Amazon so I paid 99.00 which in my opinion it is not worth. The good thing... it is very light and hangs on my plaster walls by a plate holder so I did not have to damage my walls for it.I would never by a Coby TV ,any size, any model ever again. Get your self a better TV and avoid this brand. I would like to add that I have cable and all other TVs in the house have great pictures.

Reviews.Title: buena compra
Reviews.Author: luis
Reviews.Content: hello, your TV has only one shortcoming that is what volumen.su decibel scale is high, but it sounds good sound. [[ASIN: Coby B004EBUZPQ LEDTV2326 23-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV / Monitor (Black)]]Coby LEDTV2326 23-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV/Monitor (Black)

Reviews.Title: They don't last!
Reviews.Author: mmlovers90
Reviews.Content: Bought three of these TVs for Christmas last year.  One was dead in a month but still within the return window so I got a refund.  Within six months the other two were dead and no longer able to be returned. I wish I would have purchased the warranty on these.

Reviews.Title: Died within several months
Reviews.Author: Shyla
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for about $100 December 2011 with an Amazon Lightning Deal and it's already no longer working.  Plus it very rarely got used until this May or June.  The picture was very good and I was happy with it.  I was not expecting great sound, based on reviews, and found it acceptable.  However, now the little blue power light comes on when the TV is turned on but then nothing happens on the screen and the power light fades back to what it's like when shut off.  This has been going on for two days so, unfortunately, it's likely not a little glitch.  It's like throwing $100 away when a TV can't even last one year.  I'm getting a 19" name brand TV now.

Reviews.Title: Perfect small TV!
Reviews.Author: ShoeLover
Reviews.Content: I looked everywhere for a small TV to fit in a small cubbyhole. This was the best price anywhere! Picture is great, it arrived quickly and safely. If you are looking for something under 17", then this is the one!

Reviews.Title: The best tv that I could afford.
Reviews.Author: Bill Reed
Reviews.Content: This TV is the first I have bought in 25 years.  TV's have changed so much since then.  This item is a fine-looking tv that meets my needs.

Reviews.Title: Solid purchase
Reviews.Author: Brendan
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my kitchen to replace an old tube TV...I am happy with the result. I upgraded for $99, and the free shipping took less than a week. The picture is good too. The sound is a little low but if you turn it up to the higher numbers it sounds fine. Overall a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it !
Reviews.Author: David J. Greene
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived in a timely fashion, and my wife loves the crispness of the picture. I would recommend this as a medium cost solution for a TV replacement. We acquired this TV through Amazon. The only negative is that with our cable company Comcast, there is only 1 code that Comcast support has been given from Coby (which does not work). After contacting Coby, they have given us some alternate solutions (yet untried).

Reviews.Title: Intermittently Stops Working
Reviews.Author: Napa
Reviews.Content: So, so audio and video quality.  This TV intermittently goes to blue screen and stops working.  Need to turn off to reset.  It is hard to find a TV in this size range, but this in only so, so.

Reviews.Title: Lousy  sound quality
Reviews.Author: Tentgirl
Reviews.Content: I bought this for over the fridge in the kitchen, good picture but the sound is like a tin can, works well for my purpose, but not for  serious tv watching.  I did adjust the sound in the menu, trying all the cofigurations and some custom ones to no avail.  Still a tin can sound.

Reviews.Title: Short life!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this television in December of 2011.  As of August 2012 it is shot.  I am told the LCD screen has stopped working and that it will cost more to repair it than to replace it.  I am very disappointed in this TV. I could not in good faith recommend it to anyone, even thought the price seemed reasonable.  I plan to contact Coby and see what they can do.

Reviews.Title: Fine little TV
Reviews.Author: Donna "birdwoman"
Reviews.Content: This little TV does the job with a nice clear picture, and excellent sound.  Now's the crazy part.  We bought it for our 2 small parrots to keep them company when we're not around, but we watch it too, when we're with them. So we're qualified to review it.We bought it at Amazon, and got the excellent service we always do.

Reviews.Title: This 15" Coby TV is what I needed for my small shelf
Reviews.Author: Fran Whewell
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with this TV. It is small enough for my new travel trailer. It is cute, and has a good, clear, sharp picture.

Reviews.Title: Pretty junky
Reviews.Author: Dipsy
Reviews.Content: This TV is pretty junky.  The speakers/sound is really bad.  You must watch the TV from straight on.  If you are even slightly on an angle the image gets all messed up.I use it in my kitchen.  I wished I spent an extra $50 and bought a better brand.  Oh well, the Tv was cheap enough not to care that much about it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Small Package TV
Reviews.Author: SkeeterBait
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent little TV for $100.  It has one of each type of signal input.  I use it for testing source equipment for signal output.  It is a small lightweight package that is easy to set-up or carry around.  I think it's a great value for the bucks!

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: RichNLouisiana
Reviews.Content: I wasn't expecting much in the options or connectors for the price.I was surprised that is had a TV tuner.Probably whey the product title is "TV" and not "MONITOR".so far happy with the product and shipping from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: EMBARRASSED!
Reviews.Author: HANK
Reviews.Content: TV BLEW UP LAST FRIDAY NIGHT PREVENTING MY 88 YEAR OLD MOTHER FROM WATCHING BALLGAME... BOUGHT THIS LITTLE JEWEL JUNE 20, 2012 AND SHE WAS SO PROUD, IT HAD A BEAUTIFUL PICTURE AND SHE BRAGGED ON IT AND ME EVERY DAY... THEN SUDDENLY IT WOULD NOT COME ON AND STARTED MAKING CRACKING AND POPPING NOISES WITH NO IMAGE... SHE GOT SCARED AND UNPLUGGED IT!

Reviews.Title: Great size
Reviews.Author: Monkeys1124
Reviews.Content: I already had a google tv, which you can't play video games because it lags. This tv was perfect for what i wanted it for. It's a great desk tv for playing video games!

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Louis
Reviews.Content: Surprisingly good television.  Takes up less room than my old analog tv; has great color & sound.  It does require re-positioning the angle of the screen if you shift your viewing angle, but other than that it's a great little tv.

Reviews.Title: Coby LEDTV1526 15-Inch
Reviews.Author: al9304
Reviews.Content: I read all the rewiews that people placed before I order this TV,and all negative reponses about it! Amazon is great about returns I figured that most people are cry babies and expect way too much for such a inexpensive TV. I recieved the unit it was in perfect working order as should be. I found it to have a very nice picture, and good enough sound. It is a small unit can't expect great audio out of these tiny speakers use exterior one if it is that important. I got a lot of the high number channels but some like 9-13 seem to be a problem. with experimentation I figured out that it was the antenna, not the tv. Buy the best antenna you can or connect to a roof antenna works great with that. I have had it for 3 months and very happy with so far. For the money you can't beat it

Reviews.Title: Excellent product but...
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: My only complain about this tv is that you can't see anything from an angle. It is not a big dealbreaker to me though.

Reviews.Title: review 8-6-2012
Reviews.Author: pam
Reviews.Content: Good product, thank you. I receive products every once-in-a-while from Amazon.  This was a gift for my Dad on his birthday.  He enjoys it and says it works well.

Reviews.Title: Works gr8
Reviews.Author: Xavier
Reviews.Content: Pretty dope teevee..bought it to use insanity outside my apt..works great, great size..bringing it with me to college ! Good buy

Reviews.Title: Motor Home TV
Reviews.Author: Mr D
Reviews.Content: My intent on the purchase of this TV was to get a low wattage TV for use in my motor home for my invalid wife to watch. The current draw for this TV was so low I easily purchased an inverter to run it off my battery and it works great with over the air antenna!

Reviews.Title: not so good
Reviews.Author: weasel
Reviews.Content: Had a good price and a good picture--but only if you were close to it and looking at it straight on, I returned it, any side view and the pic went black, commom problem I found out with this brand, I looked at the identical tv at Electronic Express and the store guy told me the same thing. So while it is a good buy, I don't advise it.

Reviews.Title: Great for my dorm!
Reviews.Author: Sarah H.
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for my dorm room and has amazing sound. It has a HDMI port if your computer has one. Overall, I love it and will be using it for years.

Reviews.Title: Great for monitor use...
Reviews.Author: J. Owens
Reviews.Content: This TV is excellent for computer monitor use. The company shipped ahead of time and arrived ahead of promised date. This TV has a tilt stand which most TV/monitors do not. Quality is very good and the price was actually lower than other 19 inch TVs. I would recommend the seller and the product.

Reviews.Title: Very poor product
Reviews.Author: John Scolaro
Reviews.Content: The TV worked for 2 minutes and went out, returned item immediately--do not buy this product not worth it at any price

Reviews.Title: what a piece of crap
Reviews.Author: M. M. Jones "poetsheart"
Reviews.Content: I'm disgusted,  to sit close enough to hear it properly the picture is awful and dark,  To get a good picture I have to  sit across the room then pump up the volume to hear it properly & now it just won't turn on!  ARG  I just wanted a simple low cost tv  for my bedroom but this thing is a waste of money & a nightmare.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: It's junito
Reviews.Content: If your looking for a gaming tv I would buy this. I was surprised the quality is amazing you can see no pixel.the sound of the tv Is surprisingly good. The price is pretty good for the tv . The cons is if your watching closely you can see lights at the bottom it's not to noticeable but the other bad thing is the stand it's not the best. Needs to be more sterdy. Another issue is it takes at least 7 secOnds to turn On other than that I'd recommend this to anyone

Reviews.Title: wish i'd bitten the bullet and paid a little more
Reviews.Author: item
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV and it only ever turns on part of the time.I only bought this TV for the Component YPbPr input.  I figured save a couple bucks since it's not my primary TV.  Mistake.Why is it so bright?  Everything is all washed out.  Turning down the brightness just turns everything into a uniform gray glow.  Why wouldn't it get dimmer?  What were they thinking?!The sound sucks.  One time the sound got all staticky and it was so unbearable I stopped playing the video game I had been playing.The worst thing has to be that sometimes it just won't turn on.  I've had this TV for maybe 4 months now and usually it turns on fine (with about a 10 second delay).  there's a blue standby light on the front that is on whenever the TV is plugged in.  When you press the power button, the light gets brighter and then usually the screen turns on.  Since the first week I had it, however, sometimes the light just gets brighter and then the screen stays pitch black forever.  I am able to turn the standby light back off and on.  Then it just randomly turns on later, like the next day maybe.  I think leaving it unplugged helped.Coby is a company that I know could have done better.  I should never have bought this sometimes paperweight at any price.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT ORDER THIS TV!!!
Reviews.Author: NMSimmons
Reviews.Content: This television goes black for no reason and the sound stops for no reason and you have to turn the TV off and turn it back on. This happens about every hour. http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004EBUZPQ/ref=oh_details_o03_s01_i00

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV for my car!!!  I don't find any issues at all
Reviews.Author: Dunho
Reviews.Content: For $80 bucks, man this TV/monitor is a steal.  Its beyond my expectation.It's tiny which serves the purpose as being portable, and that's all I need.  It's just a a li'l bit wider than a 13.3in laptop, so its just perfect, perfect for my car.Not sure if this is the same model that others were complaining about but I dont see any of those issues with the one I have (COBY 1526).Picture is crystal clear, sound is good, power supply is tight and I don't think it has tendency to become loose anytime soon.  I can see pictures in an angle (almost on the far side).Maybe I'm just lucky I got a unit that is not defective, or perhaps Coby rectified all those issues in their latest production?It works great in my iPhone (through AppleTV or and Apple AV Adapter / HDMI.I'm thinking to get 2 more and have it installed at the back seat of my SUV.8/17/12 - I Uploaded a picture of the TV mounted in my car.  Still havent encountered any issues.  I bought a portable indoor/outdoor antenna and hooked it up with the TV and the DTV over the air channel is awesome.  You should try it.

Reviews.Title: This TV came with no cord, what the heck?
Reviews.Author: K "K"
Reviews.Content: So I ordered this tv for my younger sister in law who is 16. I just got off the phone with them. They opened the package and found that there is no cord to plug it in! What the heck? Wouldn't recommend this tv or the seller I bought it from to anyone.UPDATE: TV DOES NOT CONNECT TO THE CABLE! IT TOOK ME WEEKS TO GET THE CORD. AND NOW IT'S 2 DAYS PAST THE RETURN WINDOW. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME, GARBAGE!

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Kaye "Busy Mom"
Reviews.Content: We got this for my daughter for Christmas. She needed a new TV for her room and this one fit the bill.  We were able to hook it up in less than five minutes and it has been working great ever since.

Reviews.Title: waste of money
Reviews.Author: gonnie
Reviews.Content: Coby as a company and this TV in particular are the worst. I bought it because it was the perfect size for my home office. It has now lost 3 different channels...  press 3 and it goes to 3.1  press 55 and it goes to 46.1  press 6 and it goes to 4.1  ??????????I contacted Coby "tech support" and was told that it was my cable provider...  NOT...  I have 3 other TVs on the same provider and they have no problems. I was then told that I could send the set to Coby and "they would see what they could do". I was promised that mailing info would be e-mailed to me...  never received.Please don't waste your money too.Gonnie

Reviews.Title: Picture quality is not good, the remote does not work
Reviews.Author: Minnie07
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is not good, it is dark and shadowy.  It is difficult to adjust the settings because the remote does not work.  I put fresh batteries in and it still did not work.

Reviews.Title: cheap components
Reviews.Author: Ernman "Ernman"
Reviews.Content: I should't have expected as much for the price. Coby seems to use typical cheap Chinese "old generation" technology as a rule (have purchased other stuff from them). Some products (audio only) seem decent, but this TV is sorry. The only reason I gave it three stars because the HDMI picture is decent when you are right in the middle of the screen and at least it has audio out jacks.But the sound is awful - tinny and hollow...i had to buy a separate audio amplifier and hook up a couple of speakers it is so bad. Also, if you are not pretty much located right in front of the screed, the picture dims and fades quickly...ie, there is a very narrow viewing angel... it starts to deteriorate at only a few degrees off center and by the time you are about 20-25 degrees off center it is almost unview-able . This is indicative of early older LCD technology...this was a problem years ago but has long been resolved by quality manufacturers...seems Coby hasn't found that out yet. luckily, this was for the bathroom so it isn't on much and is mostly listened to as background...for that, it was an ok deal...but...take note of it's short comings.

Reviews.Title: Coby LEDTV1526
Reviews.Author: Angela C. McCreery
Reviews.Content: This is a good little TV. Set up is fast and easy. Picture is a little fuzzy, but this is a great deal for the $.

Reviews.Title: Coby 15" LED TV
Reviews.Author: Sue M. Von Stetten
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for a friend who did not have an Amazon account.  They were very pleased with the prompt delivery and quality of the item.

Reviews.Title: OK....but
Reviews.Author: Scott Coleman
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on Black Friday for 99 bucks so I knew I wasn't getting top of the line. The picture is fine but the speakers are very weak. The sound emits out the back and is VERY tinny. I bought it for use while on the treadmill and in order to hear it while walking I have to max out the volume and even then it's a strain. Yes, the treadmill does make a little noise, but not that much. The 13" TV this replaced had no such issues and I may just go back to using it.

Reviews.Title: FROM A VERY HAPPY AND SATISFIED CUSTOMER
Reviews.Author: john o' brien
Reviews.Content: A GREAT SMALL SCREEN TV; PERFECT SECOND TV FOR YOUR KITCHEN OR TEENAGER'S ROOM; SHARP CLEAR PICTURE AND SOUND;EASY TO SET UP AND USE. AND A GREAT BUY FOR UNDER A HUNDRED DOLLARS.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Poor Sound
Reviews.Author: jdeboxtel
Reviews.Content: I purchased this unit for a great price.  It's worth it if you can get it for $150 or a little more.  The picture is awesome.  The sound is one of the worst I've every experienced.  If you are buying it for a small room then it's great.  On another note, external speakers aren't too expensive and Coby provides a very accessible headphone jack that you can plug an inexpensive set of computer speakers into.

Reviews.Title: ok TV for price
Reviews.Author: happywife
Reviews.Content: This TV is ok for a young child's room (which is how I am using it).  If you are looking for anything more, I would not recommend this.  It may also work in maybe a garage or work area (any place you are looking for just basic tv).  It takes a few seconds to turn on (20 -30) which isn't that big of a deal but sometimes I question if I actually turned in on and then press the button again which turns if off ( you get the picture). Also, we can't hook up a dvd player and playstation at the same time ( this maybe us and not the TV).  I purchased this during a lightening deal and also purchased a vizio for another son (only because you could only get one at the lightening deal price).  I think vizio is comparable in cost and gives a much better picture and it looks nicer (sleeker/more upscale).  If I had to do it again, I am not sure if I would buy again unless it was on sale for $80 or less.

Reviews.Title: Coby works well
Reviews.Author: Sebastian
Reviews.Content: I wanted to surprise my mom for Christmas with by installing a television in her kitchen.  This item was on sale and did the trick in terms of allowing her to watch television while not standing out in the kitchen.  She is using it to recieve over the air channnels.  The picture quality is good and it comes with a standard remote. If you need a bare bones set that will not cost too much, this is the television for you.
