Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for gaming (have tried 360, PS3, and Wii)
Reviews.Author: daniel
Reviews.Content: My mom purchased me this tv for christmas 2011 as i had been playing on a 30 year old 25 inch crt. The picture quality is excellent. It's especially great for games like halo and battlefield, as it's small so you have everything visible in one small area. I personally can't tell a difference between 1080p, 720p, and 1080i, but i have tried all these settings and they all look amazing, through both component and hdmi. The wii in 480p looks somewhat jagged, but not bad. I'd reccomend a crt for that, however. You can play wii and gamecube, but it'd look better on a recent crt than an hdtv. As for the sound, the speakers aren't the best sounding ever but aren't horrible. For gaming this isn't an issue, but it can be for music, games like rocksmith and guitar hero, movies, and other things. As a computer monitor, this is by far the highest quality computer monitor i've ever seen as long as you connect external speakers. great tv, great price.

Reviews.Title: TV REVIEW
Reviews.Author: erick
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for $141.76 on amazon, I received this within two days in good condition. The colors are great with the antenna its fantastic for the price, also i read other reviews about poor sound quality, but you get what you buy and to me the sound is good enough. I placed this tv in my bed room and I love it and at this price also, but one thing I do not like is the blue light when the television is not on, it bothers me at night and there is no way to turn it off while the tv is on standby unless you unplug it that's the only reason i'm giving it a 4 out of 5 stars, if i was not for that i would give it a 5 out of 5. So if you want something small, workable, and not so expensive get this.

Reviews.Title: This is a very slim TV
Reviews.Author: Joshua
Reviews.Content: ~ Shipping was fast and the box arrived un damaged. The product was as it was described here on amazon.The product itself it very sleek and well constructed. The default picture settings are horrible, the only good pre-set in my opinion is "Sports". So I had to create a custom setting to really bring out the best of the TV. The metal cross hook that the TV has for the add-on base-stand is adjustable. You may, however, not think so because of how tight the tilt grip is. Also the Coby TV is so thin that I was a afraid of breaking it when tilting the TV. I also fear for it falling over because the base does not seem to be able to hold the shift weight properly. If there was a mild earthquake I think this TV would fall off the entertainment stand. It would have been nice if the base was wider or heavier to properly seat the TV. Other than that the picture quality is great, it is truly a HD TV.

Reviews.Title: College Student on a budget
Reviews.Author: Phantom Knight
Reviews.Content: I knew I what I was getting when I bought this. I wasn't looking for the highest end HDTV I could find, just something small enough to fit into what space I have and still look decent with an Xbox 360 hooked up with an HDMI cable. Yes, the speakers could be better, but that's easily dealt with. Compared to what I used to have, this is 200% better than I was used to. If you're not on a budget like I was, then there are far better quality HDTVs out there. There are most definitely worse HDTVs to purchase though, and for higher prices at that.

Reviews.Title: coby led hdtv 19 inch
Reviews.Author: midway
Reviews.Content: Awesome tv for the price no one else can compare would be five stars but not enough cables with it

Reviews.Title: 19 inch tv
Reviews.Author: Timothy87
Reviews.Content: i have purchase this tv brand new from amazon.com and on the first day i set up the tv, only to have it broken the 2nd day of having the tv, so for all of those who purchase this tv watch out because i don't think it worked from the begining and i don't even think i'll get a refund

Reviews.Title: GOOD FOR THE MONEY
Reviews.Author: chevelle69
Reviews.Content: We got this TV and mounted it under our kitchen cabinets. We used the mount they suggest that allows you to turn the TV or flip it up out of the way. The Coby has a great picture and color. Like any LED TV when you look at it from the side it looks light in color. That is why you have the mount to adjust it up,down,left,right to where you are at so you get the best view. The speaker sounds come out the back instead of the front like it should. This sounds different like the speakers are a little small. Overall this TV is great for the money. We are happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv, amazing sound qaulity.
Reviews.Author: Keirria Nichole
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv 3 days ago and I love it. The picture is amazing, The sound is amazing I turned it to 30 and walked down my steps and heard it clear as day. Its very slim, and sleek. The only thing that bothered me was the TV came in it's original box, with out and outter packaging box. So I suggest you "stalk" the mail man :) But as for anything else I love this Tv.

Reviews.Title: Met my expectations
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Raiford
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for use as a TV only with a digital antenna in my home office. The choices are limited for 15 inch TV's so I took a leap of faith after reading the varied reviews and doing other research on this model.  My expectations were based on those reviews and that the TV was a $99 purchase.  Based on others comments I knew the viewing angle was limited and that the sound would be tinny.  This is a nice little TV (and my first LED).  The viewing angle is not an issue as you can move the TV around to get the best view.  The sound quality is what you would expect from a small TV but it isn't bad and the volume is more than adequate.  The built-in tuner receives about 40 channels and the picture quality is good even on channels that play black and white movies.  I was surprised by the quality of the remote and it's capabilities.  Set up was easy.  I would recommend this to anyone looking for a small TV that has multiple uses.

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: ladiilipz
Reviews.Content: PERFECT SIZE FOR MY STUDIO APT. NICE SOUND AND VERY CLEAR PICTURE !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! WOUL;D DEF RECOMMEND FOR COLLEGE STUDENT OR THE KIDS...BUT OVERALL ITS EXACTLY WHAT I EXPECTED!

Reviews.Title: colby tv
Reviews.Author: pj53
Reviews.Content: i was a little nervous buying this tv.its not one of the top brands,.but i was pleasently surprised when it arrived,it has a great picture and i watch it every night.the sound is not that great tho.seems like the speaker could be improved,it sounds a little like its in a tin can,other than that its a great lil tv.

Reviews.Title: Fit our needs perfectly
Reviews.Author: Violet J. Berry "university history major and...
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these as Christmas gifts -- one for a student and the other for a disabled friend who spends a lot of time in his room. The student needed one this size for his room also. Both are very happy with the size, quality of the picture and like the ease of hooking other devices to it. Makes me wish I that I had bought one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Like Coby 15 Inch
Reviews.Author: L. Petroni
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for a specific purpose.  I needed a lightweight monitor for filming at various convention sites.  I film part of the convention and record it to DVD and use this TV to monitor the video feed.  So for my purpose it is great because it is lightweight and compact, the other feature I bought it for is that it has HDMI connectivity. I chose this product over a computer monitor because it has build in speaker for sound if I need to monitor the sound or simply playback, so I don't have to lug speakers and have another item to plug in.  The only thing not great is that the stand screws in to the base, and requires a screwdriver to remove and put on, and the stand is not adjustable, that is it doesn't swivel up or down.  But I guess you get what you pay for, I got this product for under $100, and am very satisfied with it.  Hope you find this useful.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV for the price
Reviews.Author: 2bthe1
Reviews.Content: Very happy with it. Needed it to go in my camper mounted in the perfect corner. Now my wife, and I can watch morning news while eating breakfast.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed thus far.
Reviews.Author: Southern Mississippi
Reviews.Content: Worked fine first few days of having it.  Decent picture, though not as crisp as I would have expected for a brand new TV.  Sound is the problem we're experiencing.  It just randomly turns off sound.  You have to restart the TV and then you have sound again...then it randomly turns off again.  I bought this for my daughter's room and hoped it was a nice TV.  I'm hoping this is just a dud, as Amazon is replacing the TV with a new one at no cost to me.

Reviews.Title: absolutely great tv.. an off brand that can compete with any major name
Reviews.Author: crazytekkie
Reviews.Content: Im familiar with coby products and some have less than thrilled me so I didnt expect much more than what I paid for on this tv, HOWEVER, this tv actually changed my view on them. Its picture quality was better than my HD laptops and actually all sources have better pictures than my name brand tv's. CLean looking gloss black body, good deep blacks and actual white whites, even the remote isnt too cheap looking. Decent user menus too. We bought 2 more of them at my work and so far no issues at all with any of them and its been about 4 months now.

Reviews.Title: Small holes
Reviews.Author: kasseywassey
Reviews.Content: This is my second shipment of this product, the first TV / Monitor had a small, but very noticable hole on the screen. Amazon shipped me another one immediately, very good customer service there! However, this TV / Monitor has three pin-hole size holes on the screen as well. I need this monitor for working out of my home, otherwise I probably would have returned it too. The monitor has a nice display, I don't know about the TV, I haven't tried that feature yet. All in all, very good customer service from amazon, and the monitor is pretty good. Too bad for the holes though!

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: KKHH
Reviews.Content: It has all the features I expected and is good picture quality for the price. I got it in the good deal. Thanks to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Amazing television
Reviews.Author: lb11
Reviews.Content: I got this as a birthday gift as my 18 year old Orion just faded away. I have Hi-Def cable so the picture is crisp and the color pops out at you. Someone else said something about the sound, but the sound on mine is good. It was so easy to set up- I went to the picture menu and clicked on the auto load for the channels. Within 5 minutes it was up and running. This was well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Works great for the kiddos!
Reviews.Author: just a mom
Reviews.Content: I got this TV as one of Amazon's Lightning Deals during the holidays.  I had been looking for a good smaller flat screen to put in my 6 year old daughters room so she could watch movies.  So far it has worked wonders.  She loves it and it's not too big or too small for her room.  It was easy to set up and fits great on a small TV stand.  Her and her sister love watching movies on it!  We figure as she gets older and possibly outgrows it, it will be the perfect size for the kitchen.  It's exactly what we wanted and looks great!***UPDATE*** 4/24/2012I DID love this TV when we first got it.  Needless to say, like many others about a month ago it just stopped working.  It only turns on once a week, which is ridiculous!  I would probably not recommend any one else to get this.  It isn't worth the hassle.  Spend a little more and get a more reliable TV with a better reputation!

Reviews.Title: Love my 10-inch Coby LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: K. Kondej "purse maven"
Reviews.Content: I had this unpacked and set-up within 15 minutes in my home office.  I love it!  I don't need anything special for my office, but this tv has become my first choice for viewing.

Reviews.Title: Coby 2326 Nice Picture but Bad Sound
Reviews.Author: Stilwell Jim "falcons-farm"
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews prior to purchasing the Coby 2326 TV and was not surprised to find the sound quality being less than perfect.  Unfortunately it was far worse than I expected and totally unacceptable for my wife. She described it as painful.  One of the reviewers complemented the quality of the picture which is very good and then went on to say a set of inexpensive computer speakers was all it would take to fix the problem and he was absolutely right.  I was fortunate in being able to use reward points that I had accumulated on my BOA credit card to purchase the TV so it's like my wife said "spending forty bucks for a set of speakers was no big deal". I fixed the problem using a Logitech Z313 Speaker System and as they say, when little lady is happy everyone is happy.  For a kitchen TV with the additional speakers it's great and I recommend it. The remote has features my Sony Bravia lacks and it is easier to use.

Reviews.Title: Coby is TERRIBLE
Reviews.Author: J. Cameron Mccormick
Reviews.Content: ***UPDATE!COBY has a TERRIBLE return policy.  I bought this TV 11/29/11, and it died 11/27/12.  I talked to the company about it and they were willing to look at it if I sent it to them with the receipt in the original box, which wasn't too big of a deal because I kept it.  But they want it shipped with a trackable method (which costs more) and they want me to send a money order (which is a separate trip) for $20 for them to ship it back to me!  Seriously?! Not only do I have to pay to ship your piece of crap to you, but I have to pay you to return it?!  And I have to pay by a method that requires me to make a separate trip to get a money order instead of simply by check?!  Thank god I also bought a Squaretrade warranty because I called them up and they are sending me a box to ship them the TV, and they are writing me a check to replace it.  Thank you Squaretrade!So far it's up and running looks and sounds fine.  The only complaint I have  so far is that you probably only have about 90 degrees of viewing, by that I mean if you are looking at the screen more than about 45 degrees off perpendicular the picture quality diminishes greatly.  I got it on a lightning deal for $100 so I'm happy with it; I'm just used to my Samsung TV that has 172 degrees.

Reviews.Title: Died
Reviews.Author: C. G. Kenadjian
Reviews.Content: I have just had this set up for a day but so far it seems like a good TV for the money.  (I bought it at a discount on cyber Monday.)  Like other reviewers mentioned, the sound is somewhat hollow on it (as it is on comparable TV models), but I added computer speakers to get a fuller sound.  Nice clear picture and good controls. 6/20/13 Update:  The Power Supply in it died, along with the TV

Reviews.Title: it was a steal!!
Reviews.Author: nanak51
Reviews.Content: Just what I expected and it was so much easier than standing in line. Lightening deals are awesome and Prime is even better!!

Reviews.Title: Super picture,Great price
Reviews.Author: Carolinablue
Reviews.Content: I bought this on gold deals for $99.00 to replace my bedroom tv in the motorhome. The picture qualiy was unbelievable and was very easy to setup.  You cant beat it for the price just hope i dont have any problems later so far im very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing sound
Reviews.Author: lojan
Reviews.Content: We are very disappointed in the sound for this TV.  We had much better sound on the old TV that we replaced.  We also got this one for the kitchen to save space. I wish there was something we could add to it to correct the sound.  It has a tinny and harsh tone. Anyone got any ideas?

Reviews.Title: Great price in deal
Reviews.Author: Carlos Flores
Reviews.Content: I bought this in deal at $99.99Very good price! ideal for bedroom or kitchen, this TV is for my kid :-)

Reviews.Title: Unable to get 1080 resolution with HDMI
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: I've tried with two different computers that are able to produce 1920x1080 resolution and with this TV monitor I'm unable using the HDMI cable.  With VGA or DVI I can reach those resolutions but with the HDMI I can only go up to 720 not the full 1080 resolution.I purchased my monitor at Fry's and disappointed since I wanted full 1080 via the HDMI cable.  It's unfortunate since the clearest picture should come from the HDMI cable.Plan on returning this one.

Reviews.Title: Big Disappointment
Reviews.Author: jesse vhat "jez"
Reviews.Content: I bought this Coby led tv 2 weeks ago, I was very disappointed buying this tv for these reasons: (1) the viewing angles are awful, when you move to the right or left and also when you move up or down the picture looks washout, you have to be on the center of the screen to get a decent picture, this is how the first lcd tv made 20 years ago. (2) when you adjust the picture mode such as vivid, custom, standard, cinema etc., I chose the vivid mode when I exit from adjustment it always go back to custom mode. (3) the audio is terrible, well most flat panel lcd tv has this annoying problem, I manage to solve this problem by using a computer powered stereo speakers. I will never buy a tv made by Coby again.

Reviews.Title: It does not work
Reviews.Author: veurys gonzalez
Reviews.Content: It just turn on for few minutes, around 5, after that it get very hot and the image and sound get frozen as windows does..  But I am not using it with my computer, it happends in my ps3 and xbox360, both the same.  I ask to amazon to send me a replacement or give back my money, but they asked me to send it back.  I explain that i am out of usa I am in Dominican Republic, and send it back cost me more than buy a new one.  And, they just said we handle that in the us if you are out you have to pay the extra handle "the one i mensioned that result too expensive" that makes me thing that amazon does not care nor a few about latin clients.  So, sad that for us...

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my grand son along with the wall mount and he just loves it he has the xbox hooked up along with comcast cable and his big brothers are jealous! They still have the old box tv hey it was something that I have been wanting to do for a while because he always get hand me downs! Now he has gotten something before his big brothers!!!!!

Reviews.Title: feels like watch 3D without glasses
Reviews.Author: Hoang Le
Reviews.Content: I purchased this 23" TV it during black Friday. The shipment was quick. I was really excited. But when I watched the TV, there always be shadows behind all the images. It feels like you are watching a 3D TV without wearing a glasses. Although, the shadows are not too clear, but it makes everything a little bit blurry. I am sure it's not because of the cable. I tested it on the HDMI also, the same thing happened.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this TV
Reviews.Author: Geri Spicknall
Reviews.Content: This TV is a total waste of money.  I bought 2 of these TVs last Christmas, and after only 10 months the screen went black and we are not able to view anything.

Reviews.Title: Only a week old and already a pixel problem
Reviews.Author: S. G. "s.g."
Reviews.Content: We hooked this up for use as a monitor for our laptop, hoping to watch movies on it. After a week of use there developed a giant ice-cream looking splotch on the left hand side of the screen. We can still see through it, but it seems kind of excessive a defect for so little use. I'd not risk this item unless you are prepared to send it back.

Reviews.Title: Don't Be A Cheapskate
Reviews.Author: Kelly
Reviews.Content: You must be reading these reviews because you're intelligent.  Now, do the intelligent thing and do not even consider buying a 15" TV!  I know, I know, you want a small TV because you think the next size up, 19", is just way too ostentatious and will take up too much room (and just face it: you're cheap).  Well, I'm here to tell you that you should make space for the 19" because there are no good 15" brands out there.  This brand has such a small viewing angle that it always looked gray, and the sound is really abomidable, like an old am/fm radio.  Just pay a little more for Pete's sake, make a little space, and go with a 19".  I LOVE mine.  There is really no comparison. The 19" screens can be seen from any angle and their audio is like a normal TV.

Reviews.Title: Very unhappy
Reviews.Author: Surfinguy1010
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item during Christmas for the same reason as everyone, it was on sale, but now after only 4 months the TV has failed just like others have posted here. The same issue that others have posted with the TVs led turning on as if the TV is on and moments later turning off. Of course it is just out the 3 month warranty and would cost more to fix it then it is worth. You are better off spending a little more money on something that will actually last. Going to try to get a partial refund from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Failed after 4 months
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my daughter for Christmas. It's now April and the TV quit working. I called Coby support and they said they would replace it but I have to pay shipping both ways and I have to pay a $25 labor fee because the TV had a 1 year parts, 90 day labor warranty. Seriously, it's out of the labor warranty by 3 weeks and that won't waive it?  Between the labor and shipping, I will be out about $80-90 total. It makes more since to buy another TV from a reputable brand than put good money after bad. Don't buy anything from Coby.

Reviews.Title: Only worked for a very short time...
Reviews.Author: lindakr
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV as a lighting deal for Christmas and within 4months it no longer works. I read a recent review about the power on blue light coming on as if it powering on and then shut off. This is the same problem we are experiencing. Will not buy another Coby product they are junk.I realize that we bought it very cheap BUT I would expect at least a few years out of it NOT a few months!!! Buyer Beware!!! NOT WORTH IT!!The product is cheap BUT amazon customer service made it right and I am grateful for that and will continue to use amazon. :)

Reviews.Title: Absolute Garbage, don't waste your money.
Reviews.Author: Sherry Klest
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV as a gift for our son for Christmas. He had just bought a TV so we held on to this one, opened it last night, and tried to use it. Turned it on and it turned itself off immediately. Did this repeatedly until it stayed on long enough to search for channels. We had this hooked to a rabbit ears antenna because we were going to use it for DVD only. Some of the channels came in, some didn't. I hooked up the DVD player, put in a DVD, and the video did not work at all, sound came and went in 2 or 3 second intervals. Tried another DVD player with the same results. TV shut itself off again. We has purchased this product from HHGregg in November and they only let you return items for 10 days (and now I know why) so I called COBY Tech help. They told me I had to pay for shipping the product to them as well as sending them a $25 check to ship the product back to me. So I have to pay $50 in shipping costs for a $100 TV that did not work fresh out of the box. Do not waste your time with this company who will not even stand behind their product for the cost of shipping the product back to you at their own expense. I am, however, happy to report that hhgregg did an exchange for us although they were not required too. Hats off to hhgregg and thank you.

Reviews.Title: junky
Reviews.Author: sherman
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV and the Volumn button stopped working on the remote so I purchased 3 remotes from Coby and NONE worked. So I went to the side of the TV where the buttons were located. None of thoses worked.Good luck to all!!

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: Balanzt
Reviews.Content: Because Amazon had a good deal of the day, I decided to get this TV for my bedroom.  I received it in a reasonable amount of time, but when I hooked it up, it was all down hill from there.  The sound quality was terrible even after we adjusted all the options for sound that were available.  Then we noticed that the picture was DARK compared to the other TV we had.  We were going to settle until we shut it off and went to turn it back on.  It wouldn't turn on!  I unplugged the power, waited a few seconds and replugged it and THEN the TV worked.  It continued to do this EVERY TIME we wanted to watch it.  I checked the owners manual, and ironically enough near the beginning it tells you that STATIC ELECTRICITY may prevent it from turning on; unpluggin it will reset it, etc..  Thank God for Amazons service.  They took it back no problem.  DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!

Reviews.Title: Worked for 62 days
Reviews.Author: McMueller
Reviews.Content: Worked great for 62 days . Then it did not work at all. So I shot it with a gun and than I burned it .

Reviews.Title: I was sold a defective product!
Reviews.Author: Deborah Harris-Swan
Reviews.Content: This product was defective, I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my son through the lightening deals on Amazon.  I was recently informed by my son that the television "just stopped working," after using it for only three months!  It will probably cost me more to have it fixed as only parts are covered by the manufacturer's warranty now.  I have been a loyal Amazon customer for a number of years and am extremely disappointed by my purchase from them!!!  At this point, I would caution you to be careful when making electronic purchases on Amazon.3/9/12 Update: I am somewhat satisfied with the way Amazon provided a partial refund for this defective product.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Salsapete "."
Reviews.Content: After scanning my channels I noticed an extreamly large difference from analog to digital reception. Analog reception was extreamly poor. Also this set had a defect that when you turned it off it would lose it's memory and you had to rescan for channels. Product was returned for refund and I will never purchase nor recommend this brand again.

Reviews.Title: warranty
Reviews.Author: enamibn
Reviews.Content: i would like to know if this product comes under a warranty. and what is the procedure in fixing it

Reviews.Title: 19 in tv
Reviews.Author: jleona
Reviews.Content: perfect for my small bedroom--great color and sound--would recommend to any one--good clear picture--my buy large one later for livingroom

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: J. Dulin
Reviews.Content: Awful sound pixels and screen was going out after less than an hour of use I would highly recommend staying away from this product.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: M. Mason
Reviews.Content: Great picture and good sound for the price.  Now I need a good outdoor antenna. I need 5 more words.

Reviews.Title: Great little television.
Reviews.Author: Gail E. Jones
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for my bedroom.  Slim, light weight, and easy to set up. The picture quality is excellent. Great little television.

Reviews.Title: TV is great
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: The shipping was absolutely ridiculous. They shipped it in the tv box itself and left it on my doorstep with no one home. This could have easily been stolen. Absolutely horrible shipping methods and I was very disappointed with this seller. The tv is a great product though.

Reviews.Title: box was open when I received it
Reviews.Author: tvbuyer
Reviews.Content: I just got box in mail. Box was half way open. I didn't have the time to open and check if functional, but when I get back to office I expect the worse.

Reviews.Title: Cheap for a reason
Reviews.Author: Zach Nelson
Reviews.Content: This tv lasted for roughly 5 minutes of use over a 4 week period. Now it turns itself off immediately after powering up. I just missed the Amazon return period by a few days - NOT HAPPY.

Reviews.Title: kitchen tv
Reviews.Author: A. Lawyer
Reviews.Content: Perfect for what it is-- use in the kitchen for news, weather, etc.  Looks good, easy set up to cable, decent quality picture/sound.

Reviews.Title: Muy bueno
Reviews.Author: Mauro
Reviews.Content: Estoy satisfecho con el TV Monitor, es muy bueno para el trabajo que yo realizo. No he tenido inconvenientes y si estuviera de oferta nuevamente lo volvería a COMPRAR

Reviews.Title: junk!!!!!
Reviews.Author: a1026z
Reviews.Content: only used in my office, dead in two months, looks nice but its junk!!!!junk, junky, junkest poor quality alot of money for 60 days!

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!!!
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Received this TV on Dec. 5, 2011 and the display would no longer work, when powered on you would get the blue power light blink bright then turnoff again without the display. It was within the 30 days to return so I returned for another and received the second one aprrox. Jan 12, 2012. I received the same display problem on senond TV that was sent to me but broke after the 30 days. I cannot return it to get my full refund and left me paying for a TV that is just a lemon. I feel like this model TV is made to last after the warranty days so the manufacturer can make money. Never will purchase a Coby again!!!

Reviews.Title: questionable as a monitor
Reviews.Author: dennis
Reviews.Content: This worked well as a television. Usless as a monitor. Another monitor was needed to set the resolution, and was a pain as I bought this because mine was not working. The usless part is that it would not hold the resolution requiring an other monitor to set it up each time the compter was shut down. The best part was Amazon's send back policy & the credit card was reimbursed within 2 days of the return arrival.

Reviews.Title: Sound is a problem.
Reviews.Author: Jerome Cohen
Reviews.Content: Delivery was prompt. The connections simple. The picture is fine! The sound is bad. The good news is that the volume at the highest is also bad.

Reviews.Title: I would never purchase another Coby product
Reviews.Author: Josie
Reviews.Content: When the TV was opened the remote worked for about 1 day. After that it no longer worked. I changed the batteries, read the troubleshooting suggestions and even called customer service to report the issue and was told that they were too busy to help and I would have to call back another time. I will never buy another Coby product again. The TV is very slow to turn on even if you push the power button on the unit itself, but once the picture comes it is OK color.

Reviews.Title: XBox 360?
Reviews.Author: Margee
Reviews.Content: I ordered this 2 weeks ago with 75.00 off and now it is up to 100.00.  Why did you not tell me to wait or credit my account.  You knew you were going to do this.  If I bought at a store I have 30 days for a difference.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk
Reviews.Author: S. Jessie
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV for a guest room that is only used a few times each year.  It was purchased just before Christmas holiday guests arrived.  I don't know if it was turned on but probably was.  I tried to turn it on again in May, and the TV is dead.  It will not turn on.  $99.00 is a great price for a LED TV but a very expensive price for a piece of junk that didn't last 6 months -- or maybe shorter!  The warranty for repair runs out after 90 days.  We can pay $25.00 to return it but would still pay for labor. The cost would more than likely be more than the original price of the TV. If you buy a Colby, make sure it is cheese and not any kind of electronics -- we won't!  If I could give it less than 1 star, I would.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for!
Reviews.Author: Steve "SDsteve6"
Reviews.Content: Unless you plan to use this set with a cable box, you better forget about this one. My cable system transmits most of the HD channels above 1000. This TV set channel selections end at 999. Whats with that? And the other reviews regarding analog channels  are very true. The TV does a very poor job of processing analog channels. Don't waste your money!

Reviews.Title: I'll wait.......
Reviews.Author: Bruce
Reviews.Content: I'm reading reviews saying its a good buy for $99 and I'm about to pay $132........ Oh well, think I'll wait...... Funny!

Reviews.Title: ok, good product
Reviews.Author: marce
Reviews.Content: article is good. price ratio is very good, I am happy with the purchase.The Coby LEDTV1526 15-Inch LED TV 720p 60 Hz with HDMI  is what I expected, looks good and feels durable

Reviews.Title: Does not work
Reviews.Author: MJE
Reviews.Content: Purchased on sale as Christmas gift.  After 2 days, t.v. made a noise when turned on and no longer works.  Would not recommend, and will not purchase this brand again.

Reviews.Title: I read six reviews
Reviews.Author: Sondra K. Miller
Reviews.Content: I read six reviews from buyers of this model and all stated that the picture was fine but that the sound quality was pretty bad.  Based on those reviews Coby is not a brand I would buy.

Reviews.Title: no respect for disabled
Reviews.Author: balassimo
Reviews.Content: I am handicap and was unable to mail it back....Abt would only offer me a credit. BAD TV AND CUSTOMER SERVICE.I would not recomend either.

Reviews.Title: NOT FOR A COMPUTER MONITOR!
Reviews.Author: John J
Reviews.Content: I was happy to have received this as an add on display for my laptop computer (MacBook).When I connected it to my notebook using an HDMI cable the settings were way off (the text and screen overflow) when I tried to go into the settings of the monitor to make adjustments - the section I needed to access "computer settings" is not accessible because I am using an HDMI cable.The simple fact that I am not able to access these settings renders this monitor absolutely useless.

Reviews.Title: Not a TV!
Reviews.Author: Earl & Susan "Self help-Pyschology"
Reviews.Content: This monitor is labeled as a TV though is not a TV. I ordered it and sent it right back! I then ordered a real TV by Panasonic! Amazon should allow this deception. If you read the fine print you will notice that Contain Monitors do not come with remote controls. They are Monitors that can be used as TV's. Nothing more.

Reviews.Title: Globilization history
Reviews.Author: nursejoan
Reviews.Content: Puts history in the perspective of globilization over the centuries. Clearly written and illustrations were great.The three ring binder edition allowed flexibility and easy to cary.

ProductInfo.Features:
23 inch diagonal TFT LED widescreen HDTV (1080p)
Attractive super-slim profile fits anywhere
Energy efficient technology meets Energy Star 3.0 standards
Built-in digital TV tuner (ATSC/NTSC/QAM)
HDMI digital connection delivers perfect signal transmission
23 inch widescreen LED HDTV with attractive super-slim profile fits anywhere
Energy efficient technology meets Energy Star 3.0 and California Energy Commission standards(standby power <1W)
PC VGA connection for use as a computer monitor and V-chip parental control, Closed-Caption, and Electronic Program
ProductInfo.Name: Coby LEDTV2326 23-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED HDTV/Monitor (Black)
